creatures.name: Bahamut
creatures.appearance: A colossal whale-like creature of unimaginable size, its body shimmering with cosmic hues and strange glyphs etched into its skin.

attacks.name: Cosmic Tail Slam
attacks.effect: On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone and pushed 20 feet.

attacks.name: Astral Bellow
attacks.effect: All creatures within 60 feet must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of Bahamut’s next turn.

creatures.name: Bake-kujira
creatures.appearance: A spectral whale skeleton draped in tattered phantom flesh, glowing with eerie ghost-lights.

attacks.name: Ethereal Bite
attacks.effect: Target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or lose 1 hit die (or take additional 2d8 necrotic if it has no hit dice).

attacks.name: Wail of the Damned
attacks.effect: All creatures within 30 feet must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of their next turn.

creatures.name: Cetus
creatures.appearance: A massive hybrid of boar-headed whale, sleek dolphin-like body, and a fan-shaped, split tail. Its hide is rough and barnacle-encrusted.

attacks.name: Savage Tusks
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked back 10 feet.

attacks.name: Whirlpool Crash
attacks.effect: Creates a swirling vortex of water (20-foot radius). Creatures in the area must make a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be pulled 10 feet closer and knocked prone.

creatures.name: Devil Whale
creatures.appearance: An enormous whale with dark, craggy skin resembling stone, huge glowing eyes, and a mouth lined with jagged teeth.

attacks.name: Shipbreaker Maw
attacks.effect: On a hit against a wooden structure or ship, deals double damage. Against creatures, on a failed DC 18 Dexterity save, swallowed target is considered grappled (escape DC 18) and takes 3d8 acid damage per turn.

attacks.name: Tidal Fluke
attacks.effect: All creatures within 15 feet must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or be slammed by a wave, taking full damage and being knocked prone.

creatures.name: Encantado
creatures.appearance: A sleek pink dolphin capable of turning into a charming human with a mysterious smile and a straw hat.

attacks.name: Siren's Song
attacks.effect: Each humanoid within 30 feet who can hear it must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become charmed for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Enchanted Bite (Dolphin Form)
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or become confused (as the Confusion spell) for 1 round.

creatures.name: Glashtyn
creatures.appearance: A dark, sleek horse-like goblin with a damp mane and luminous eyes, its skin perpetually dripping seawater.

attacks.name: Drowning Charge
attacks.effect: On a hit, if near water, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength save or be dragged underwater, beginning to suffocate.

attacks.name: Brackish Kick
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: Gveleshapi
creatures.appearance: A serpent-whale hybrid with a serpentine neck, massive whale body, and emerald-green scales that shimmer in aquatic light.

attacks.name: Flood Breath
attacks.effect: A 30-foot cone of frigid water forces creatures to make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be blinded by swirling currents and take full damage. Half damage and no blindness on a success.

attacks.name: Scale Whip
attacks.effect: Gveleshapi lashes out with its serpentine tail. On a hit, target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be restrained as the tail coils around them.

creatures.name: Makara
creatures.appearance: A chimeric beast with the head of an elephant and the body of a large fish, adorned with colorful, ornate scales.

attacks.name: Trunk Bash
attacks.effect: On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Aqua Rampage
attacks.effect: A surge of water erupts around the Makara. Creatures in a 20-foot radius must make a DC 15 Dexterity save or be pushed 10 feet away and take the full damage.

creatures.name: Mug-wamp
creatures.appearance: A colossal sturgeon-like creature with ridged scales, two massive pectoral fins, and sharp protruding bone shards.

attacks.name: Spine Bash
attacks.effect: On a hit, the target must make a DC 14 Constitution save or suffer a bleeding wound (1d6 damage at the start of each of its turns until healed).

attacks.name: Tremor Splash
attacks.effect: Mug-wamp slams the water, causing a small localized quake. Creatures within 15 feet must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: Sea Goat
creatures.appearance: A hybrid with the front half of a sturdy mountain goat and the rear half of a shimmering fish.

attacks.name: Horn Charge
attacks.effect: On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet back.

attacks.name: Tidal Leap
attacks.effect: The Sea Goat leaps from the water, crashing down upon a target. On a hit, the target must make a DC 13 Dexterity save or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: Selkie
creatures.appearance: A graceful seal that can shed its skin to become a beautiful human. Often wearing a cloak of seal fur.

attacks.name: Skin Shatter
attacks.effect: Only usable in seal form; Selkie bites fiercely. On a hit, target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or lose 5 feet of movement due to pain.

attacks.name: Beguiling Charm
attacks.effect: In human form, Selkie can force a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or charm one humanoid for 1 hour, causing it to act as an ally.

creatures.name: Water Bull
creatures.appearance: A large amphibious bull with slick, dark fur, glowing red eyes, and curled horns that drip with brackish water.

attacks.name: Gore
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Nightstream Charge
attacks.effect: The Water Bull charges through water at incredible speed. On a hit, target must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity save or be grappled by its horns.

creatures.name: Water Horse
creatures.appearance: A broad category of mythical water-dwelling horses, slick-coated and often with aquatic features like fins or webbed hooves.

attacks.name: Drowning Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, if target is adjacent to a body of water, it must make a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be dragged underwater.

attacks.name: Wave Stomp
attacks.effect: Stomps the surface of water, creating a shockwave. Creatures within 10 feet must make a DC 13 Constitution save or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

creatures.name: Ceffyl Dŵr
creatures.appearance: A spectral horse formed of swirling mist and spray, semi-transparent and constantly dripping.

attacks.name: Mist Kick
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 round.

attacks.name: Veil of Vapor
attacks.effect: The horse fills a 15-foot radius with dense mist. Creatures in the area have disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of the Ceffyl Dŵr's next turn.

creatures.name: Each-uisge
creatures.appearance: A malevolent, shape-shifting water horse with a dark, slimy coat and feral, predatory eyes.

attacks.name: Grasping Mane
attacks.effect: Its mane wraps around a target. On a hit, target is grappled (escape DC 15) and takes 2d6 slashing damage at the start of each of its turns until freed.

attacks.name: Drown and Drag
attacks.effect: If the target is grappled, Each-uisge dives underwater. The target must hold its breath or begin suffocating, taking damage each round.

creatures.name: Enbarr
creatures.appearance: A divine steed of shimmering silver fur, capable of racing across both land and sea as if both were solid ground.

attacks.name: Trample
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Surfstride
attacks.effect: Enbarr causes the ground or water to ripple. Creatures in a 20-foot line must make a DC 14 Dexterity save or fall prone as balance is disrupted.

creatures.name: Hippocampus
creatures.appearance: A horse with the rear of a fish, iridescent scales, and a crest of fin-like spines along its neck.

attacks.name: Fin Lash
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be pulled 5 feet closer.

attacks.name: Brine Breath
attacks.effect: A 15-foot cone of supercooled mist. Creatures must make a DC 13 Constitution save or have their movement halved until the end of their next turn.

creatures.name: Ichthyocentaurs
creatures.appearance: Upper body of a human, lower front of a horse, and fish-like tail. Often depicted with shells, coral crowns, and tridents.

attacks.name: Trident Thrust
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 14 Strength save or drop one held item.

attacks.name: Wavecaller
attacks.effect: Summons a surge of water in a 10-foot radius. Creatures must make a DC 14 Dexterity save or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: Kelpie
creatures.appearance: A dark green, dripping horse-creature with kelp-like mane and glowing, eerie eyes.

attacks.name: Constricting Bridle
attacks.effect: On a hit, target is grappled (escape DC 14). While grappled, the Kelpie can move freely, forcing the victim along.

attacks.name: Bog Rush
attacks.effect: Kelpie surges through swampy terrain, causing it to become difficult terrain. Targets in the path must make DC 13 Dexterity save or be restrained by thick mud.

creatures.name: Morvarc'h
creatures.appearance: A legendary black horse that can gallop across the waves, leaving a trail of glowing surf.

attacks.name: Surf Sprint
attacks.effect: Morvarc'h dashes through enemies on water's surface. Each creature in a 10-foot line must make a DC 13 Dexterity save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Moonlit Neigh
attacks.effect: All creatures within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom save or be charmed until the end of Morvarc'h’s next turn.

creatures.name: Nixie
creatures.appearance: A shapeshifting water being, sometimes appearing as a beautiful human or a sleek water horse, with lily pads and reeds in her hair.

attacks.name: Ensnaring Melody
attacks.effect: Targets within 30 feet must make a DC 14 Wisdom save or become charmed and walk closer to the Nixie.

attacks.name: Reed Lash
attacks.effect: A whip of river reeds. On a hit, target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength save or be entangled, reducing speed to 0.

creatures.name: Nuckelavee
creatures.appearance: A horrifying skinless horse-man hybrid with exposed muscle and sinew, carrying a stench of decay.

attacks.name: Pestilent Breath
attacks.effect: A 15-foot cone of toxic fumes. Creatures must make DC 15 Constitution save or be poisoned for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Flesh Rake
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution save or suffer disadvantage on attack rolls for 1 round due to pain.

creatures.name: Nuggle
creatures.appearance: A smaller water horse with a mischievous grin, slick dark fur and a perpetually dripping tail.

attacks.name: Splash Kick
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 12 Dexterity save or be soaked, granting disadvantage on stealth checks.

attacks.name: Illusionary Bridle
attacks.effect: Nuggle creates a minor illusion of treasure or safe passage. Targets must succeed on DC 13 Intelligence save or be lured into dangerous terrain.

creatures.name: Tangie
creatures.appearance: A shapeshifting sea horse entity, often seen as a lanky horse-man covered in seaweed.

attacks.name: Seaweed Lash
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 14 Strength save or be restrained by clinging seaweed.

attacks.name: Drowning Illusion
attacks.effect: Tangie projects illusions of drowning hazards. Targets within 30 feet must make a DC 14 Wisdom save or become frightened for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Anansi
creatures.appearance: A human-sized spider with intricate patterns on its abdomen, capable of standing on two legs and wielding small tools.

attacks.name: Web Snare
attacks.effect: Target must make a DC 13 Strength save or be restrained by sticky webs. Escaping requires a DC 13 Strength check.

attacks.name: Trickster’s Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target makes a DC 14 Constitution save or is poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned, target is confused (as Confusion spell) for 1 round.

creatures.name: Arachne
creatures.appearance: A humanoid upper body with a spider’s abdomen and legs, elegant yet unsettling, wearing tattered remnants of woven silk.

attacks.name: Venomous Fang
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution save or be poisoned for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Silk Strand
attacks.effect: Arachne attempts to ensnare a target within 30 feet. Target must make a DC 14 Dexterity save or become restrained. Target can attempt a DC 14 Strength check to break free.

creatures.name: Carbuncle (Chilote, Arthropod form)
creatures.appearance: A beetle-like creature with a glowing, ruby-like protrusion on its forehead, carapace shimmering greenish-red.

attacks.name: Fiery Horn
attacks.effect: On a hit, the target’s clothes or fur may catch fire, taking 1d6 fire damage at the start of each of their turns until extinguished.

attacks.name: Swarm Call
attacks.effect: Carbuncle summons a swarm of tiny glowing beetles. Creatures in a 15-foot radius must make a DC 13 Wisdom save or be dazzled, granting attackers advantage against them until end of next round.

creatures.name: Gold-digging Ant
creatures.appearance: A large, dog-sized ant with golden-tinted chitin, powerful mandibles, and antennae that detect precious metals.

attacks.name: Mandible Crush
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make a DC 14 Strength save or drop one carried metal item as the ant tries to claim it.

attacks.name: Burrow Ambush
attacks.effect: If attacking from underground, the target must make a DC 14 Dexterity save or be knocked prone as the ant erupts from below.

creatures.name: Iktomi
creatures.appearance: A lanky humanoid figure with spider-like limbs and subtle chitin plating on the joints.

attacks.name: Claw Slash
attacks.effect: On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity save or be disarmed of one held item.

attacks.name: Illusory Web
attacks.effect: Creates illusory strands in a 15-foot area. Creatures must make a DC 14 Intelligence save or treat the area as difficult terrain and have disadvantage on attack rolls due to confusion.

creatures.name: Jorōgumo
creatures.appearance: A beautiful woman from the waist up, and a giant spider below. Silken robes blend with spider silk.

attacks.name: Enthralling Gaze
attacks.effect: One humanoid within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom save or be charmed for 1 minute, defenseless against her next bite.

attacks.name: Venomous Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Constitution save or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned, target takes 1d6 additional poison damage each turn.

creatures.name: Karkinos
creatures.appearance: A giant crab with iron-hard claws and a shell covered in barnacles.

attacks.name: Crushing Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make a DC 15 Strength save or be grappled. Grappled target takes 1d8 bludgeoning damage at the start of each of Karkinos’ turns.

attacks.name: Shell Slam
attacks.effect: Karkinos rears up and slams its shell down. All creatures within 10 feet must make a DC 14 Dexterity save or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: Khepri
creatures.appearance: A giant scarab beetle with a gleaming carapace of iridescent blues and greens, holding a golden disc mimicking the sun.

attacks.name: Radiant Mandibles
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make a DC 14 Constitution save or be blinded until the end of its next turn due to the beetle’s brilliance.

attacks.name: Solar Blessing
attacks.effect: Khepri bathes an area in sunlight. Allies within 30 feet gain advantage on their next attack roll. Enemies must make a DC 14 Wisdom save or have disadvantage on their next attack roll.

creatures.name: Mothman
creatures.appearance: A tall, humanoid moth with large glowing red eyes and greyish feathers instead of fur.

attacks.name: Glaring Eyes
attacks.effect: A 30-foot cone of red eye-glow. Targets must make a DC 15 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Wing Buffet
attacks.effect: Mothman strikes with powerful wings. On a hit, target must make a DC 14 Strength save or be pushed 10 feet away.

creatures.name: Myrmecoleon
creatures.appearance: A strange hybrid of ant and lion, with the head and forebody of a lion and the abdomen of a giant ant.

attacks.name: Predatory Pounce
attacks.effect: On a hit, if the target is surprised, it takes an extra 1d8 slashing damage and must make a DC 14 Strength save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Acidic Spray
attacks.effect: A 15-foot cone of caustic spray. Targets must make a DC 15 Dexterity save or take full damage and have their AC reduced by 1 for one round as armor sizzles.

creatures.name: Myrmidons
creatures.appearance: Soldiers created from ants, humanoid in shape but with segmented exoskeleton and antenna-like helmets.

attacks.name: Spear Thrust
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make a DC 13 Strength save or drop their shield (if any) due to the force of impact.

attacks.name: Coordinated Strike
attacks.effect: If at least two Myrmidons are adjacent to the target, they deal an extra 1d6 piercing damage each due to perfect teamwork.

creatures.name: Pabilsag
creatures.appearance: A chimera-like being: human torso, lower body of a horse, scorpion tail, often depicted with stars and astral symbols.

attacks.name: Stinger Lunge
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make a DC 15 Constitution save or become paralyzed for 1 minute, repeating the save at end of each turn.

attacks.name: Astral Arrow
attacks.effect: Fires a spectral arrow of starlight. On a hit, target glows faintly, granting advantage to the next attack roll made against it.

creatures.name: Scorpion Man
creatures.appearance: A powerful humanoid warrior with the tail of a scorpion, often guarding gates or passages.

attacks.name: Chitinous Spear
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make a DC 14 Strength save or be pushed 5 feet back.

attacks.name: Sting of Vigilance
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Constitution save or take disadvantage on Perception checks for 1 minute, as venom clouds the senses.

creatures.name: Selket
creatures.appearance: A goddess in scorpion form or a woman with a scorpion on her head, radiant and regal.

attacks.name: Divine Sting
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 16 Constitution save or be poisoned and blinded for 1 round.

attacks.name: Healing Venom
attacks.effect: Selket can cure allies of poison or disease by touching them. Restores 2d8 hit points and removes poisoned condition.

creatures.name: Tsuchigumo
creatures.appearance: A colossal, shape-shifting spider with vivid markings and human-like face patterns on its abdomen.

attacks.name: Giant Web Toss
attacks.effect: A huge net of sticky silk covers a 20-foot area. Creatures must succeed on DC 15 Strength checks to move. Failing traps them in place.

attacks.name: Venom Fang Fury
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Constitution save or take an additional 1d6 poison damage at the start of each of its turns for 3 turns.

creatures.name: Balayang
creatures.appearance: A large humanoid bat spirit with patterned wings and a gentle, wise gaze.

attacks.name: Echo Pulse
attacks.effect: A 30-foot cone of sonic waves. Targets must make DC 13 Constitution save or be deafened for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Spirit Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, the target glows faintly. Until Balayang’s next turn, attacks against that target have +1 to hit.

creatures.name: Camazotz
creatures.appearance: A giant bat with razor-sharp fangs, humanoid limbs, and obsidian-tipped claws.

attacks.name: Obsidian Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Constitution save or lose 5 hit points at the start of each turn from bleeding until healed.

attacks.name: Screech of the Underworld
attacks.effect: A 20-foot radius shriek. Targets must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be frightened and take full damage.

creatures.name: Leutogi
creatures.appearance: A Samoan princess protected by bats, appearing as a humanoid figure wreathed in fluttering bat silhouettes.

attacks.name: Bat Swarm
attacks.effect: A swarm of bats engulfs a 15-foot area. Creatures inside must make DC 13 Dexterity save or be blinded by the flurry of wings.

attacks.name: Guiding Wing
attacks.effect: Leutogi grants an ally advantage on its next attack by directing a bat to distract the foe.

creatures.name: Minyades
creatures.appearance: Three bat-like sisters with humanoid features, draped in dark veils, their eyes gleaming eerily.

attacks.name: Coordinated Shriek
attacks.effect: If all three Minyades shriek together, each creature in 30 feet must make a DC 15 Wisdom save or be stunned for 1 turn.

attacks.name: Vampiric Kiss
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 14 Constitution save or lose 1 Hit Die (or 2d6 additional necrotic if no Hit Dice remain). The Minyade regains hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt.

creatures.name: Tjinimin
creatures.appearance: Ancestral bat figure, tall and slender with wings of shimmering darkness, carrying ceremonial markings.

attacks.name: Dreamtime Wingbeat
attacks.effect: A slow, rhythmic wingbeat. Targets must make DC 15 Charisma save or fall into a brief trance, losing their reaction until next turn.

attacks.name: Bone Piercer
attacks.effect: On a hit, the target’s movement is halved until they spend an action to remove the lodged bone shard.

creatures.name: Vetala
creatures.appearance: A vampiric entity inhabiting corpses, often bat-like in face or sprouting membranous wings.

attacks.name: Corpse Possession
attacks.effect: Vetala can animate a nearby corpse as a zombie ally. The zombie acts on Vetala’s initiative and remains animated until destroyed.

attacks.name: Life Drain
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Constitution save or lose 1 level of Exhaustion (Vetala gains temporary HP equal to damage dealt).

creatures.name: Ababil
creatures.appearance: A miraculous flock of small birds with swift wings and beaks that can carry tiny stones of divine energy.

attacks.name: Divine Pebble Drop
attacks.effect: A hail of tiny stones from above. Creatures in a 10-foot radius must make DC 13 Dexterity save or take full damage and be dazzled (disadvantage on next attack).

creatures.name: Adarna
creatures.appearance: A radiant bird with multicolored plumage that shifts hues with each of its songs.

attacks.name: Slumber Song
attacks.effect: All creatures within 20 feet must make DC 15 Wisdom save or fall asleep for 1 minute or until damaged.

attacks.name: Petrifying Note
attacks.effect: One target that failed the Slumber Song save must now make a DC 15 Constitution save or turn to stone for 1 hour.

creatures.name: Avalerion
creatures.appearance: A rare, graceful bird with pure white feathers and a golden beak, said to only exist in pairs.

attacks.name: Wing Buffet
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make a DC 12 Strength save or be knocked back 5 feet.

attacks.name: Healing Cry
attacks.effect: Avalerion emits a soothing call. Allies within 30 feet regain 2d6 hit points and remove one level of Exhaustion.

creatures.name: Alicanto
creatures.appearance: A bird with luminescent feathers shimmering gold and silver. Its eyes glow in the dark.

attacks.name: Dazzle Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

attacks.name: Ore Pecks
attacks.effect: If the target is wearing metal armor, Alicanto deals an additional 1d4 damage as it pecks at the metal hungrily.

creatures.name: Anqa
creatures.appearance: A large, mysterious female bird with majestic plumage of fiery reds and oranges, often wreathed in warm winds.

attacks.name: Tempest Wings
attacks.effect: A gust of hot wind in a 15-foot cone. Targets must make DC 14 Strength save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Sunfire Beak
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 15 Dexterity save or catch fire (1d6 fire damage per round until extinguished).

creatures.name: Anzû
creatures.appearance: A massive lion-headed eagle with enormous wings that crackle with elemental energy.

attacks.name: Thunderous Screech
attacks.effect: All creatures in a 30-foot cone must make a DC 16 Constitution save or be deafened for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Lion’s Talons
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 15 Strength save or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: Bare-fronted Hoodwink
creatures.appearance: A nearly invisible bird, faintly outlined against the air, with a hooded crest.

attacks.name: Phantom Peck
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make a DC 13 Wisdom save or be unable to perceive the Hoodwink until it attacks again.

creatures.name: Alkonost
creatures.appearance: A beautiful woman’s head and torso with the body of a brightly colored bird. Its voice is enchanting.

attacks.name: Melodic Lullaby
attacks.effect: All creatures within 30 feet must make a DC 15 Wisdom save or fall asleep for 1 minute or until they take damage.

attacks.name: Taloned Grasp
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Dexterity save or be grappled (escape DC 14).

creatures.name: Gumyōchō
creatures.appearance: A two-headed bird with human-like faces, one on each head, whispering secrets.

attacks.name: Twin Screech
attacks.effect: Creatures in a 20-foot cone must make a DC 14 Constitution save or be stunned until the end of the Gumyōchō’s next turn.

attacks.name: Doubled Insight
attacks.effect: As a bonus action, the Gumyōchō grants itself advantage on the next attack roll by reading the opponent’s moves with both heads.

creatures.name: Harpy
creatures.appearance: A fierce, winged woman with sharp talons and a shrill voice, often accompanied by foul winds.

attacks.name: Harpy’s Song
attacks.effect: All humanoids within 30 feet must make a DC 14 Wisdom save or be charmed, moving closer to the Harpy.

attacks.name: Rending Talons
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 13 Strength save or drop one held item.

creatures.name: Horus
creatures.appearance: A deity with a falcon’s head and a human body, radiating divine authority.

attacks.name: Solar Gaze
attacks.effect: On a hit, target makes DC 15 Constitution save or be blinded for 1 round.

attacks.name: Falcon Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, Horus may immediately fly up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

creatures.name: Inmyeonjo
creatures.appearance: A crane-like bird with a serene human face, often depicted in ancient murals.

attacks.name: Tranquil Call
attacks.effect: Creatures within 20 feet must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be calmed, unwilling to attack for 1 round.

attacks.name: Beak Jab
attacks.effect: On a hit, the target’s next attack roll is made at disadvantage as they are unsettled by the strange visage.

creatures.name: Kalavinka
creatures.appearance: A celestial being with a human head and a bird’s torso and tail, known for its heavenly voice.

attacks.name: Heavenly Choir
attacks.effect: All creatures in a 30-foot radius must succeed on DC 15 Wisdom save or be incapacitated by blissful visions for 1 round.

attacks.name: Soothing Wing
attacks.effect: Heals an ally within 10 feet for 3d6 hit points as feathers glow with healing light.

creatures.name: Karura
creatures.appearance: A divine creature with a human torso and an eagle’s head, often wreathed in fire.

attacks.name: Flame Gust
attacks.effect: A 15-foot cone of fire. Targets must make DC 14 Dexterity save or catch fire, taking 1d6 fire damage at start of their turns until extinguished.

attacks.name: Skyborne Dive
attacks.effect: Karura swoops down. On a hit, target must make DC 15 Strength save or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: Kinnara
creatures.appearance: Half-bird, half-human celestial musicians with gentle features and lute-like instruments.

attacks.name: Harmonic Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Wisdom save or have disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn due to disorienting harmony.

attacks.name: Serenity Chord
attacks.effect: Allies within 30 feet gain advantage on their next saving throw as calming music steadies their minds.

creatures.name: Siren
creatures.appearance: Bird-women with enchanting voices, beautiful yet deadly, often perched on crags near the sea.

attacks.name: Enthralling Song
attacks.effect: Each humanoid within 60 feet must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be charmed, moving closer to the Siren each turn.

attacks.name: Razor Claws
attacks.effect: On a hit, if the target is charmed, the Siren deals an additional 1d6 psychic damage.

creatures.name: Swan Maiden
creatures.appearance: A woman who can don a swan skin to become a graceful white swan.

attacks.name: Wing Buffet
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Dexterity save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Lunar Grace
attacks.effect: Swan Maiden may cast a minor healing spell (2d8+2 HP) on herself or an ally once per short rest.

creatures.name: Caladrius
creatures.appearance: A pure white bird said to cure diseases by drawing them into itself.

attacks.name: Purifying Gaze
attacks.effect: One creature within 30 feet is cured of one disease or poisoned condition. Caladrius takes 2d6 necrotic damage as it absorbs the malady.

attacks.name: Beak Peck
attacks.effect: On a hit, the target must make DC 12 Constitution save or be stunned for one round, surprised by the sudden assault.

creatures.name: Chalkydri
creatures.appearance: Heavenly sun-creatures, half-bird, half-angelic, with brightly burning feathers.

attacks.name: Solar Flare
attacks.effect: A 20-foot cone of searing light. Targets must make DC 15 Constitution save or be blinded for 1 minute (repeat save end of turn).

attacks.name: Healing Hymn
attacks.effect: All allies within 30 feet regain 2d8 hit points and gain advantage on their next saving throw.

creatures.name: Chamrosh
creatures.appearance: A creature with the body of a dog and the head and wings of a bird, guardian of the mountain of all birds.

attacks.name: Aerial Pounce
attacks.effect: Chamrosh leaps from above. On a hit, target must make DC 14 Strength save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Guardian’s Cry
attacks.effect: All allied birds in 30 feet gain +2 to AC and saving throws for the next round.

creatures.name: Cinnamon Bird
creatures.appearance: A rare, fragrant bird that builds nests from cinnamon sticks, smelling sweet and spiced.

attacks.name: Spice Gust
attacks.effect: A 15-foot cone of cinnamon dust. Targets must make DC 14 Constitution save or cough uncontrollably, losing their reaction until next turn.

attacks.name: Nest Barrage
attacks.effect: Flings cinnamon sticks at a target. On a hit, target has disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks due to stinging eyes and nose.

creatures.name: Devil Bird
creatures.appearance: A dark, owl-like bird with glowing red eyes and a piercing, human-like scream.

attacks.name: Death Omen Shriek
attacks.effect: All creatures within 30 feet must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Taloned Rake
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Constitution save or be stunned until the start of the Devil Bird’s next turn.

creatures.name: Gagana
creatures.appearance: A miraculous bird with an iron beak and copper claws, rumored to dwell in distant lands.

attacks.name: Iron Peck
attacks.effect: On a hit, target’s armor takes a permanent -1 to AC if it’s made of metal, as the iron beak dents it.

attacks.name: Copper Claw Rend
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Strength save or be grappled, taking 1d6 slashing at the start of each turn while grappled.

creatures.name: Gandabherunda
creatures.appearance: A monstrous two-headed bird of immense size, associated with thunder and protection.

attacks.name: Double-Beak Strike
attacks.effect: Roll to hit twice against the same target (one for each head). If both hits land, target is knocked prone.

attacks.name: Thunder Wing
attacks.effect: Beating its wings, it creates a shockwave. All creatures in 20 feet must make DC 16 Constitution save or be stunned until end of their next turn.

creatures.name: Gamayun
creatures.appearance: A prophetic bird with a woman’s head, bringing knowledge and warnings.

attacks.name: Voice of Fate
attacks.effect: One creature within 30 feet must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be compelled to speak a secret they know aloud.

attacks.name: Foresight Peck
attacks.effect: On a hit, Gamayun predicts the target’s next move. The target has disadvantage on its next attack roll.

creatures.name: Garuda
creatures.appearance: A colossal eagle-like being, often depicted as the mount of Vishnu, radiant and swift.

attacks.name: Divine Talons
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 16 Wisdom save or be blinded by the holy light for 1 round.

attacks.name: Gale Wing
attacks.effect: Garuda creates a powerful gust. All creatures in 20 feet make DC 15 Strength save or be pushed 15 feet away.

creatures.name: Hakawai
creatures.appearance: A nocturnal, elusive bird rarely seen, known more by its eerie calls.

attacks.name: Echoing Cry
attacks.effect: Targets in a 30-foot radius make DC 14 Wisdom save or have disadvantage on Perception checks for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Silent Talon
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 12 Wisdom save or be surprised (no reactions) until end of its next turn.

creatures.name: Hudhud
creatures.appearance: A hoopoe bird with a distinctive crown of feathers, known for carrying messages to prophets.

attacks.name: Message of Truth
attacks.effect: Forces one target within 30 feet to make DC 14 Wisdom save or be compelled to tell the truth for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Beak Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 13 Dexterity save or drop a held object.

creatures.name: Huginn and Muninn
creatures.appearance: Two ravens perched together, one representing thought and the other memory.

attacks.name: Thought’s Peck (Huginn)
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Intelligence save or lose its next reaction as its mind is muddled.

attacks.name: Memory’s Claw (Muninn)
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 14 Wisdom save or forget one prepared spell (or one known ability) until its next rest.

creatures.name: Itsumade
creatures.appearance: A monstrous bird with a human face and snake-like neck, often seen at night over disaster areas.

attacks.name: Wailing Cry
attacks.effect: All creatures in 20 feet make DC 15 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Serpentine Peck
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Constitution save or take an additional 1d6 poison damage each round for 3 rounds.

creatures.name: Jingwei
creatures.appearance: A small bird determined to fill the sea with twigs and stones, symbol of perseverance.

attacks.name: Pebble Rain
attacks.effect: A flurry of small stones. On a hit, target must make DC 12 Strength save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Stubborn Will
attacks.effect: Jingwei grants itself advantage on its next attack or saving throw as it never gives up.

creatures.name: Lamassu
creatures.appearance: A protective deity with a human head, body of a bull or lion, and eagle’s wings.

attacks.name: Guardian’s Aegis
attacks.effect: All allies within 10 feet gain +2 AC for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Winged Charge
attacks.effect: On a hit, target makes DC 15 Strength save or is pushed 10 feet and knocked prone.

creatures.name: Luan
creatures.appearance: A majestic, mythical bird adorned with a shield-like chest plate, trampling snakes underfoot.

attacks.name: Shielded Peck
attacks.effect: On a hit, Luan gains +2 to AC until the start of its next turn.

attacks.name: Snake Stomp
attacks.effect: If the target is reptilian or serpent-like, the attack deals an extra 2d6 damage.

creatures.name: Minokawa
creatures.appearance: A giant dragon-like bird that can devour the sun or moon, with metallic feathers.

attacks.name: Eclipse Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 16 Constitution save or be blinded for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Metallic Wing Slash
attacks.effect: On a hit, target’s armor is rent. If it’s non-magical armor, its AC bonus decreases by 1 (permanently).

creatures.name: Nachtkrapp
creatures.appearance: A dark, raven-like bird of the night, known to snatch misbehaving children.

attacks.name: Childsnare Clutch
attacks.effect: On a hit against a Small or smaller target, DC 14 Strength save or be grappled and carried aloft.

attacks.name: Night’s Cry
attacks.effect: All creatures in a 10-foot radius must make DC 13 Wisdom save or be frightened until end of their next turn.

creatures.name: Nine-headed Bird
creatures.appearance: A totemic bird with nine heads, each shrieking in discordant harmony.

attacks.name: Ninefold Screech
attacks.effect: Targets in a 20-foot radius must make DC 15 Constitution save or be stunned until the end of their next turn.

attacks.name: Multi-Peck
attacks.effect: Roll 1d10; on a roll of 9 or 10, an additional head pecks for an extra 1d8 piercing damage.

creatures.name: Alectryon
creatures.appearance: A rooster transformed from a careless soldier, its feathers bearing subtle hints of armor plating.

attacks.name: Dawn Crow
attacks.effect: All enemies within 30 feet must make a DC 13 Wisdom save or be blinded by sudden morning light until the end of their next turn.

attacks.name: Spur Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make a DC 12 Dexterity save or drop one held weapon as they flinch.

creatures.name: Basan
creatures.appearance: A fire-breathing chicken with brilliantly colored plumage and glowing eyes.

attacks.name: Ember Breath
attacks.effect: A 15-foot cone of embers. Targets must make DC 14 Dexterity save or catch fire, taking 1d6 fire damage each turn until extinguished.

attacks.name: Fiery Peck
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make a DC 13 Constitution save or have disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of Basan’s next turn due to searing pain.

creatures.name: Cockatrice
creatures.appearance: A small draconic creature with the head of a rooster and the body of a serpent-like dragon.

attacks.name: Petrifying Gaze
attacks.effect: One target within 30 feet must make DC 14 Constitution save or begin turning to stone, restrained for 1 round. A failed save on the next turn fully petrifies the target.

attacks.name: Venom Peck
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Constitution save or be poisoned for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Gallic Rooster
creatures.appearance: A proud rooster with red, white, and blue plumage and a regal bearing.

attacks.name: Patriotic Cry
attacks.effect: All allies within 20 feet gain +1 to attack rolls and saving throws for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Beak Jab
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 12 Wisdom save or lose their reaction until the end of their next turn.

creatures.name: Gullinkambi
creatures.appearance: A bright red rooster perched in Valhalla, herald of cosmic events.

attacks.name: Ragnarok Crow
attacks.effect: All creatures within 30 feet must make DC 15 Constitution save or be deafened for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Valiant Peck
attacks.effect: On a hit, if the target is evil-aligned (GM’s discretion), Gullinkambi deals an extra 1d6 radiant damage.

creatures.name: Rooster of Barcelos
creatures.appearance: A carved rooster statue brought to life, brightly painted and carrying a hint of divine justice.

attacks.name: Innocence Call
attacks.effect: Forces one creature within 30 feet to make DC 14 Charisma save or reveal one of its crimes or misdeeds aloud.

attacks.name: Stony Peck
attacks.effect: On a hit, the target is partially petrified, reducing its movement by half until the end of its next turn.

creatures.name: Sarimanok
creatures.appearance: A legendary chicken with colorful, ornate plumage and decorative streamers, symbol of fortune.

attacks.name: Fortune’s Wing
attacks.effect: One ally within 30 feet gains advantage on its next attack or saving throw as luck swirls around them.

attacks.name: Decorative Peck
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Intelligence save or be distracted by the vivid colors, granting the Sarimanok advantage on its next attack.

creatures.name: Víðópnir
creatures.appearance: A rooster perched atop Yggdrasil, shining like gold, spreading knowledge of the nine worlds.

attacks.name: World-Tree Cry
attacks.effect: All creatures within 30 feet must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be overcome by cosmic insight, stunned for 1 round.

attacks.name: Golden Spur
attacks.effect: On a hit, target is outlined in golden light, granting advantage to all attacks against it until the end of Víðópnir’s next turn.

creatures.name: Aethon
creatures.appearance: An eagle that torments Prometheus, massive, with fiery eyes and iron-like talons.

attacks.name: Liver Rend
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Constitution save or be weakened, dealing -1d4 less damage on its attacks for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Beak of Eternity
attacks.effect: If the target is immortal or has any regeneration, they lose that feature for 1 round as the eagle’s bite disrupts their essence.

creatures.name: Griffin
creatures.appearance: A majestic hybrid with the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle.

attacks.name: Pouncing Claws
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 14 Strength save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Beak Tear
attacks.effect: On a hit, if the target is prone, deal an extra 1d8 damage.

creatures.name: Hippogriff
creatures.appearance: Front half of an eagle, hind half of a horse, noble and swift.

attacks.name: Aerial Strike
attacks.effect: Hippogriff can swoop down from flight. If it moves at least 20 feet straight toward the target, deal an extra 1d8 damage.

attacks.name: Beak Snap
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 12 Strength save or drop one held item.

creatures.name: Hræsvelgr
creatures.appearance: A giant eagle-shaped jötunn perched at the end of the world, creating winds with its wings.

attacks.name: World-Wind
attacks.effect: All creatures in a 30-foot cone must make DC 16 Strength save or be pushed 20 feet and knocked prone.

attacks.name: Beak of the Horizon
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be disoriented, losing its next bonus action.

creatures.name: Poukai
creatures.appearance: A monstrous predatory bird, large enough to carry off humans, likely based on extinct giant eagles.

attacks.name: Raking Talons
attacks.effect: On a hit, if target is Medium or smaller, must make DC 15 Strength save or be grappled.

attacks.name: Swooping Snatch
attacks.effect: If grappling a target, Poukai may fly half its speed upward. The target takes falling damage if released mid-air.

creatures.name: Shahbaz
creatures.appearance: A noble eagle that guided the ancient Iranian peoples, feathers glinting like steel.

attacks.name: Guiding Wing
attacks.effect: On a hit, one ally within 30 feet gains advantage on their next attack as Shahbaz directs their aim.

attacks.name: Steel Feather Flurry
attacks.effect: Shahbaz flutters its feathers aggressively. Creatures in a 10-foot radius must make DC 14 Dexterity save or take full damage.

creatures.name: Triple-headed Eagle
creatures.appearance: An eagle with three heads, each with piercing eyes of a different color.

attacks.name: Triple Beak Bite
attacks.effect: Roll to hit once; on success, deal damage three times (one for each head).

attacks.name: Tri-scream
attacks.effect: All creatures in 20 feet must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be stunned for 1 round from the overwhelming cacophony.

creatures.name: Wuchowsen
creatures.appearance: A giant eagle who lives atop a mountain and governs one of the four winds.

attacks.name: Wind Gust
attacks.effect: A 15-foot cone of wind. Targets failing a DC 14 Strength save are pushed 10 feet away.

attacks.name: Tempest Dive
attacks.effect: On a hit, the target must make DC 13 Dexterity save or be knocked prone as the wind swirls violently.

creatures.name: Ziz
creatures.appearance: A gigantic griffin-like bird that can block out the sun with its wings.

attacks.name: Sunshadow Wing
attacks.effect: A 30-foot radius is darkened. Enemies in the darkness must make DC 15 Wisdom save or suffer disadvantage on all attacks for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Titanic Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, if target is Large or smaller, it must succeed DC 16 Strength save or be grappled. Grappled target takes 1d8 slashing each turn.

creatures.name: Zu
creatures.appearance: A divine lion-headed eagle that guards sacred items.

attacks.name: Sacred Shriek
attacks.effect: Creatures in 20 feet must make DC 15 Charisma save or be unable to speak lies for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Lion’s Grasp
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 14 Dexterity save or drop one magical item as Zu tries to seize it.

creatures.name: Nyctimene
creatures.appearance: A woman transformed into an owl by Minerva, plumage dark and eyes glowing faintly.

attacks.name: Silent Glide
attacks.effect: Nyctimene becomes invisible until she attacks. Next attack deals +1d6 psychic damage from surprise.

attacks.name: Cursed Talons
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Wisdom save or have their maximum HP reduced by amount of necrotic damage dealt until next long rest.

creatures.name: Owlman
creatures.appearance: A humanoid owl with large, glowing red eyes and silent wings.

attacks.name: Fearsome Gaze
attacks.effect: A target within 30 feet must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Razor Talons
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Dexterity save or lose 10 feet of movement as they struggle with deep cuts.

creatures.name: Sirin
creatures.appearance: A bird with a woman’s head, often resembling an owl, known for luring men to their demise with beautiful songs.

attacks.name: Enthralling Hymn
attacks.effect: All humanoids within 60 feet must make DC 15 Wisdom save or become charmed, moving closer to Sirin each turn.

attacks.name: Rending Talons
attacks.effect: If the target is charmed, Sirin deals an extra 1d6 psychic damage.

creatures.name: Strix
creatures.appearance: A monstrous, vampiric owl that feeds on human flesh and blood.

attacks.name: Blood Drain
attacks.effect: On a hit, target makes DC 15 Constitution save or be drained of 1 Hit Die (or 2d6 extra necrotic if no HD). Strix regains HP equal to half damage dealt.

attacks.name: Wing Buffet
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Strength save or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: Bugbear
creatures.appearance: A hulking, goblinoid bear-like creature with coarse fur, long limbs, and a menacing grin.

attacks.name: Mauling Claws
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Strength save or be knocked prone as the Bugbear lunges forward with brute strength.

attacks.name: Fearsome Growl
attacks.effect: All creatures within 20 feet must make a DC 14 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 minute. Creatures can repeat the save at the end of their turns.

creatures.name: Callisto
creatures.appearance: A celestial bear, once a nymph, shimmering with starlight in her fur.

attacks.name: Celestial Swipe
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Constitution save or be blinded by a flash of starlight until the end of its next turn.

attacks.name: Ursa’s Embrace
attacks.effect: On a hit, Callisto grapples the target (escape DC 14). While grappled, target takes 1d8 radiant damage at the start of its turn due to cosmic energy.

creatures.name: Adlet
creatures.appearance: A humanoid figure with canine legs and features, often clad in furs, half-dog, half-human.

attacks.name: Savage Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Constitution save or contract a mild curse causing disadvantage on Dexterity checks for 1 hour.

attacks.name: Feral Howl
attacks.effect: Allies within 30 feet gain advantage on their next attack roll as the howl emboldens them.

creatures.name: Amarok
creatures.appearance: A giant lone wolf that hunts solitary travelers at night, with thick grey fur and glowing eyes.

attacks.name: Midnight Maul
attacks.effect: On a hit, if it is nighttime or in darkness, Amarok deals an extra 1d6 cold damage.

attacks.name: Lone Stalker
attacks.effect: If Amarok is the only attacker targeting a single creature, its next attack against that creature has advantage, representing its predatory focus.

creatures.name: Anubis
creatures.appearance: A deity with the head of a jackal and a human body, wearing regal, ancient attire.

attacks.name: Judgment Gaze
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Charisma save or be frightened and unable to tell a lie for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Embalming Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Constitution save or have disadvantage on death saves until the end of Anubis’s next turn.

creatures.name: Aralez
creatures.appearance: A benevolent dog-like spirit with healing saliva and ghostly, shimmering fur.

attacks.name: Healing Lick
attacks.effect: Restores 3d8 hit points to an ally or stabilizes a dying creature. If used offensively (very rare), can disorient undead (DC 14 Wis save or undead is stunned 1 round).

attacks.name: Bark of Courage
attacks.effect: All allies within 20 feet gain advantage on saving throws against fear for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Asena
creatures.appearance: A mythical she-wolf with silver fur and piercing yellow eyes, often a progenitor figure.

attacks.name: Lunar Bite
attacks.effect: If under moonlight, deals an extra 1d4 radiant damage.

attacks.name: Pack Mother’s Cry
attacks.effect: Summons 1d4 wolf spirits who fight alongside Asena for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Axehandle hound
creatures.appearance: A dog-like creature with a stout body shaped like an axe-handle, tough and gnarled.

attacks.name: Handle Slam
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Strength save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Timber Howl
attacks.effect: Creatures within 30 feet must succeed DC 13 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 round, imagining the crashing of trees.

creatures.name: Black dog (Barghest/Black Shuck)
creatures.appearance: A large, spectral black dog with glowing red eyes, often seen as an omen of death.

attacks.name: Spectral Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Charisma save or become frightened and lose 5 hit points at the start of each turn for 3 turns as fear drains their life.

attacks.name: Harbinger’s Howl
attacks.effect: All creatures within 30 feet must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be frightened. Those who fail by 5 or more also lose 1 Hit Die permanently (returned after a long rest).

creatures.name: Beast of Gévaudan
creatures.appearance: A massive wolf-like beast rumored to be impervious to normal weapons, with bristling fur and fiery eyes.

attacks.name: Savage Rend
attacks.effect: On a hit, if the weapon used against it in the last turn was non-magical, the Beast takes half damage from that attack (passive trait).

attacks.name: Bloodcurdling Snarl
attacks.effect: All creatures within 15 feet must succeed on DC 15 Wisdom save or lose their reaction and have disadvantage on their next attack due to terror.

creatures.name: Carbuncle (Chilote, small dog form)
creatures.appearance: A small luminescent dog-like creature with a glowing gem embedded in its forehead.

attacks.name: Gem Beam
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Dexterity save or be blinded until the end of their next turn.

attacks.name: Enlightening Howl
attacks.effect: Allies within 20 feet gain +1 to attack rolls and saving throws for 1 minute as the radiant energy emboldens them.

creatures.name: Cerberus
creatures.appearance: A giant, three-headed dog guarding the gates of the Underworld, each head snarling independently.

attacks.name: Triple Bite
attacks.effect: Roll once to hit; on success, deal 3d8 damage. Target must make DC 15 Strength save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Underworld Breath
attacks.effect: A 15-foot cone of miasma. Targets failing DC 15 Constitution save are also frightened for 1 round.

creatures.name: Chupacabra
creatures.appearance: A reptilian or canine creature with spines down its back, known for draining blood from livestock.

attacks.name: Blood Drain
attacks.effect: On a hit, target makes DC 14 Constitution save or lose 1d4 hit points at the start of each of its turns for 3 turns. Chupacabra regains half that amount as temporary HP.

attacks.name: Leaping Strike
attacks.effect: If Chupacabra moved at least 20 feet toward the target, target must succeed on DC 14 Strength save or be grappled.

creatures.name: Cu Sith
creatures.appearance: A large green fairy dog with a long braided tail, harbinger of death.

attacks.name: Fey Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be charmed by Cu Sith, compelled to follow it for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Deathly Bay
attacks.effect: Creatures within 30 feet must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be frightened and lose 1 Hit Die (or take 2d6 necrotic if no Hit Dice) due to the unnatural howl.

creatures.name: Crocotta
creatures.appearance: A dog-wolf hybrid with hyena-like features and the ability to mimic human voices.

attacks.name: Mimicry Lure
attacks.effect: Forces a DC 14 Wisdom save. On fail, target approaches Crocotta’s position, losing their reaction as they’re distracted, granting Crocotta advantage on its next attack.

attacks.name: Hyena Maw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 14 Strength save or drop one held item as the Crocotta’s powerful jaws jostle it.

creatures.name: Cynocephaly
creatures.appearance: A humanoid figure with the head of a dog or jackal, often tribal and warlike.

attacks.name: Spear Thrust
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Dexterity save or be disarmed of a shield if they carry one.

attacks.name: Howling Rally
attacks.effect: All Cynocephali allies within 30 feet gain advantage on their next attack roll.

creatures.name: Dogs of Actaeon
creatures.appearance: A pack of hunting dogs that turned against their master, swift and relentless.

attacks.name: Pack Tactics
attacks.effect: If two or more Dogs of Actaeon are adjacent to the same target, each gains advantage on attack rolls against that target.

attacks.name: Hamstring Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed DC 13 Strength save or have movement halved for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Fenrir
creatures.appearance: A colossal wolf destined to devour gods, with massive jaws and chains dangling from its limbs.

attacks.name: World-Fang Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 18 Strength save or be swallowed whole. While swallowed, target is blinded, restrained, and takes 3d8 acid damage at start of Fenrir’s turns.

attacks.name: Shacklesnap
attacks.effect: Fenrir snaps its chains, creating a shockwave. All creatures in 20 feet must make DC 16 Dexterity save or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: Gelert
creatures.appearance: A loyal hound spirit known for its protective nature, glowing faintly in moonlight.

attacks.name: Guardian’s Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, Gelert may choose one ally within 5 feet of the target. That ally gains 2d6 temporary HP.

attacks.name: Loyal Bark
attacks.effect: Allies within 20 feet have advantage on saving throws against fear and charm for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Hellhound
creatures.appearance: A large black hound with glowing red eyes, smoke curling from its nostrils.

attacks.name: Infernal Breath
attacks.effect: A 15-foot cone of flames. Targets must make DC 14 Dexterity save or catch fire, taking 1d6 fire damage at start of their turn.

attacks.name: Fiery Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 round.

creatures.name: Huli jing / Kitsune / Kumiho
creatures.appearance: A fox spirit with multiple tails, cunning eyes, often in human guise.

attacks.name: Illusory Glamour
attacks.effect: Forces a DC 15 Wisdom save. On fail, target is charmed and sees the fox spirit as a trusted friend for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Foxfire Bolt
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Intelligence save or have disadvantage on their next spell attack or saving throw against spells.

creatures.name: Huodou
creatures.appearance: A large black dog that can breathe fire, with eyes that glow like embers.

attacks.name: Flame Maw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed DC 13 Constitution save or be burned, taking 1d6 fire damage at the start of their turn for 3 turns.

attacks.name: Cinder Bark
attacks.effect: Creates a 10-foot radius of smoke. All creatures inside must make DC 13 Constitution save or be blinded until they exit the smoke.

creatures.name: Kludde
creatures.appearance: A demonic canine with bat wings, a bird’s beak, and bear claws, eyes glowing, swift and cunning.

attacks.name: Multi-Claw Rend
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Dexterity save or lose its next reaction due to the vicious assault.

attacks.name: Shapeshift Terror
attacks.effect: Kludde changes shape (wolf, bat, bird), forcing a DC 14 Wisdom save from witnesses. On fail, they are frightened for 1 round.

creatures.name: Orthrus
creatures.appearance: A two-headed dog, sibling of Cerberus, fierce and vigilant.

attacks.name: Double Bite
attacks.effect: If both heads hit the same target, target must succeed on DC 14 Strength save or be grappled.

attacks.name: Guarding Snarl
attacks.effect: Until Orthrus’s next turn, attacks against Orthrus have disadvantage, as it weaves its two heads menacingly.

creatures.name: Penghou
creatures.appearance: A tree spirit resembling a black dog formed from a tree’s essence, wood-like fur and sappy breath.

attacks.name: Sappy Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Strength save or be restrained by sticky sap. Escape DC 13 Strength.

attacks.name: Bark Shield
attacks.effect: Penghou hardens its bark-like fur, gaining +2 AC until the start of its next turn.

creatures.name: Psoglav
creatures.appearance: A humanoid creature with a dog’s head, a single eye, and iron teeth, standing on horse’s legs.

attacks.name: Iron Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target makes DC 14 Constitution save or take an additional 1d6 necrotic damage as the iron corrodes their flesh.

attacks.name: Cyclopean Glare
attacks.effect: One creature within 30 feet must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be stunned until the end of Psoglav’s next turn.

creatures.name: Salawa
creatures.appearance: A slender, jackal-like animal associated with the god Set, with elongated limbs and a narrow head.

attacks.name: Typhon’s Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed DC 14 Wisdom save or have disadvantage on Perception checks for 1 minute due to the unsettling aura.

attacks.name: Desert Mirage
attacks.effect: Creates illusory duplicates (as per Mirror Image spell) of itself for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Sigbin
creatures.appearance: A strange dog-like creature with a goat-like head, walking backwards, sucking blood from victims.

attacks.name: Backwards Kick
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Dexterity save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Blood Siphon
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Constitution save or lose 1d4 hit points at the start of each turn (for 3 turns), Sigbin regains half as temporary HP.

creatures.name: Sky Fox
creatures.appearance: A celestial nine-tailed fox with golden fur, revered for wisdom and longevity.

attacks.name: Celestial Flame
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Intelligence save or be unable to cast spells above cantrip level for 1 round, as mystical flames disrupt thought.

attacks.name: Wisdom’s Gaze
attacks.effect: Sky Fox grants an ally advantage on all Intelligence and Wisdom checks for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Shug Monkey
creatures.appearance: A dog-monkey hybrid with mischievous eyes, black fur, and a prehensile tail.

attacks.name: Grasping Tail
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Strength save or be grappled. While grappled, Shug Monkey can’t use its tail on another target.

attacks.name: Mocking Chatter
attacks.effect: Forces DC 14 Charisma save. On fail, target has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn due to distraction.

creatures.name: Tanuki
creatures.appearance: A Japanese raccoon dog known for shape-changing, trickery, and a jovial demeanor.

attacks.name: Illusory Form
attacks.effect: Tanuki assumes the appearance of a humanoid or beast. Creatures must make DC 14 Intelligence save or believe the illusion and have disadvantage on attacks against the Tanuki for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Sake Smash
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Strength save or drop one carried object as Tanuki bashes them with a sake bottle.

creatures.name: Tulikettu (Firefox)
creatures.appearance: A fox with flaming fur, whose capture is said to bring great fortune.

attacks.name: Flame Dash
attacks.effect: Tulikettu moves through a creature’s space. That creature must make DC 13 Dexterity save or catch fire (1d6 fire damage per turn until extinguished).

attacks.name: Aurora Pounce
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 14 Charisma save or be enchanted by the foxfire’s glow, granting Tulikettu advantage on attacks against it for 1 round.

creatures.name: Vǎrkolak (Vukodlak)
creatures.appearance: An undead vampire werewolf, gaunt and slavering, patches of fur missing, eyes glowing unnaturally.

attacks.name: Infected Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Constitution save or contract lycanthropy (GM’s discretion).

attacks.name: Hungering Howl
attacks.effect: All creatures within 30 feet must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 minute. If a creature fails by 5 or more, it is also cursed to lose 1 HD until cured by magic.

creatures.name: Werewolf
creatures.appearance: A humanoid wolf, standing upright, ferocious and strong, cursed to transform by the full moon.

attacks.name: Claw Swipe
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Constitution save or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy (if setting allows).

attacks.name: Bestial Leap
attacks.effect: Werewolf leaps up to 20 feet. If it lands adjacent to a foe, it makes one free Bite attack at advantage.

creatures.name: Bael
creatures.appearance: A demon king depicted with three heads: a man, a toad, and a cat. The cat’s head is often snarling.

attacks.name: Triple-Voiced Command
attacks.effect: All creatures within 30 feet must make DC 15 Wisdom save or become charmed for 1 minute, hearing conflicting whispers from three heads.

attacks.name: Cat’s Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 14 Wisdom save or be cursed with mild paranoia (disadvantage on Insight checks) for 1 hour.

creatures.name: Ball-tailed Cat
creatures.appearance: A cougar-like feline with a spiked ball at the end of its tail used like a mace.

attacks.name: Tail Smash
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Strength save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Spiked Whip
attacks.effect: If it hits the same target twice in the same turn, that target bleeds (1d4 damage at start of each turn until healed).

creatures.name: Cactus Cat
creatures.appearance: A bobcat-like feline with thorny fur and sharp bone spurs on its front legs. Sometimes said to become intoxicated by cactus sap.

attacks.name: Spine Rake
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Constitution save or suffer 1d4 poison damage for 3 rounds due to cactus sap on spines.

attacks.name: Thorny Cry
attacks.effect: A shriek that forces DC 13 Wisdom save. On fail, target is distracted, granting the Cactus Cat advantage on its next attack against them.

creatures.name: Canaima
creatures.appearance: A were-jaguar or shapechanger. A humanoid jaguar form with rippling muscles and a predatory glare.

attacks.name: Jaguar Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Dexterity save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Predator’s Pounce
attacks.effect: Canaima leaps up to 20 feet as a bonus action. Its next melee attack this turn has advantage.

creatures.name: Cat-sìth
creatures.appearance: A large black cat with a white spot on its chest, said to steal souls from the newly dead.

attacks.name: Soul Steal
attacks.effect: On a hit, if target is at 0 HP, it cannot be stabilized by normal means for 1 minute. If target is conscious, they must make DC 15 Charisma save or be frightened for 1 round.

attacks.name: Shadow Prowl
attacks.effect: Cat-sìth becomes invisible in dim light or darkness until it attacks. Its first attack out of invisibility deals +1d6 damage.

creatures.name: Cath Palug
creatures.appearance: A monstrous cat so large and fierce it was said to kill many warriors, fur dark and matted.

attacks.name: Mighty Pounce
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Strength save or be grappled. While grappled, Cath Palug’s bite attacks against the target have advantage.

attacks.name: Fearsome Yowl
attacks.effect: All creatures within 30 feet make DC 15 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 minute. Save ends at end of their turn.

creatures.name: Carbuncle (cat form)
creatures.appearance: A cat with a glowing gemstone on its chin, luminescent fur, and eerie greenish-red light.

attacks.name: Gem Flash
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Wisdom save or be blinded until end of their next turn.

attacks.name: Enigma Purr
attacks.effect: All creatures within 15 feet must make DC 14 Wisdom save or have disadvantage on their next attack due to sudden confusion.

creatures.name: Demon Cat
creatures.appearance: A spectral cat that appears larger than normal, eyes glowing red, often an omen of doom.

attacks.name: Ethereal Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Ominous Hiss
attacks.effect: All creatures within 20 feet must succeed DC 14 Charisma save or have disadvantage on saving throws until the end of Demon Cat’s next turn.

creatures.name: Kaibyō (Cat Yōkai)
creatures.appearance: Any of various supernatural cats, often with split tails or eerie fires, cunning and mystical.

attacks.name: Phantom Swipe
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Wisdom save or see illusory duplicates of Kaibyō, imposing disadvantage on the target’s next attack.

attacks.name: Will-o’-Whisker
attacks.effect: A ghostly flame dances at the end of Kaibyō’s whiskers. On a hit, target takes ongoing 1d6 fire damage (DC 13 Dexterity to extinguish).

creatures.name: Bakeneko
creatures.appearance: A cat Yōkai that can walk on hind legs, speak human language, and sometimes have two tails.

attacks.name: Cursed Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Charisma save or be cursed, losing 1d4 from all saving throws until a short rest.

attacks.name: Illusionary Disguise
attacks.effect: Bakeneko assumes the form of a humanoid. DC 15 Intelligence (Investigation) to see through. While disguised, its next attack deals +1d6 psychic damage.

creatures.name: Kasha
creatures.appearance: A cat-like demon that steals corpses, often wreathed in hellish flames.

attacks.name: Corpse Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit against a dead or unconscious creature, Kasha can drag them away at half speed. If it holds a corpse, Kasha gains +2 AC from fearsome display.

attacks.name: Hellfire Swipe
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Dexterity save or catch fire (1d6 fire damage per round until extinguished).

creatures.name: Nekomata
creatures.appearance: A two-tailed cat Yōkai, often old and wise, capable of necromancy and manipulating the dead.

attacks.name: Necro Tail Lash
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed DC 14 Constitution save or lose one death saving throw if at 0 HP, or take an additional 2d6 necrotic if conscious.

attacks.name: Raise Corpse
attacks.effect: Nekomata animates one nearby corpse as a zombie under its control for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Nue
creatures.appearance: A chimera with a monkey’s face, a tanuki’s body, a tiger’s limbs, and a serpent tail. Often considered feline due to the tiger part.

attacks.name: Chimeric Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, roll 1d4: (1) Monkey Face: target charmed; (2) Tanuki Body: target confused; (3) Tiger Claws: extra 1d6 damage; (4) Snake Tail: poison (DC 15 Con).

attacks.name: Nightmare Mist
attacks.effect: A 20-foot cloud. Targets inside make DC 15 Wisdom save or suffer disadvantage on all attacks until they leave the cloud.

creatures.name: Panther
creatures.appearance: A sleek black feline, sometimes mythical, larger and more cunning than normal panthers.

attacks.name: Ambush Leap
attacks.effect: If Panther attacked from stealth, target must make DC 13 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 round.

attacks.name: Terrifying Roar
attacks.effect: All enemies within 20 feet make DC 14 Wisdom save or have disadvantage on their next attack roll.

creatures.name: Pard
creatures.appearance: A swift, spotted cat-like creature known for incredible speed and a venomous bite.

attacks.name: Venom Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Constitution save or be poisoned for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Blurred Sprint
attacks.effect: Pard can take the Dash action as a bonus action, and until the end of its turn, attacks against it have disadvantage.

creatures.name: Phantom Cat / Alien Big Cat
creatures.appearance: A large, elusive feline that fades into shadows, rumored but rarely confirmed.

attacks.name: Ghostly Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be unable to perceive the Phantom Cat for 1 round.

attacks.name: Silent Stalk
attacks.effect: Phantom Cat becomes invisible if in dim light or darkness until it attacks or enters bright light.

creatures.name: Underwater Panther
creatures.appearance: A powerful feline with reptilian features and horns, dwelling underwater. Sometimes associated with storms.

attacks.name: Drowning Clutch
attacks.effect: If near water, on a hit target must make DC 14 Strength save or be pulled underwater, starting to drown.

attacks.name: Storm Roar
attacks.effect: A 20-foot radius shockwave. Targets must make DC 15 Constitution save or be deafened and pushed 10 feet.

creatures.name: Wampus cat
creatures.appearance: A cat-like creature with six legs, long tail, said to have once been a cursed human. Associated with Southern Appalachia.

attacks.name: Hexed Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 14 Charisma save or be cursed, taking -1d4 penalty on all attack rolls for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Mournful Yowl
attacks.effect: All enemies within 30 feet must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be frightened until they spend an action to steel their resolve.

creatures.name: White Tiger
creatures.appearance: A majestic, divine tiger that guards the West, with pure white fur and a regal demeanor.

attacks.name: Celestial Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be blinded by brilliant light for 1 round.

attacks.name: Warding Roar
attacks.effect: All allies within 20 feet gain +2 to AC for 1 minute as the White Tiger’s protective aura envelops them.

creatures.name: Winged cat
creatures.appearance: A domestic cat with small, feathery wings, agile in flight.

attacks.name: Aerial Pounce
attacks.effect: If attacking from above, target must make DC 12 Dexterity save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Distracting Flutter
attacks.effect: Winged cat flutters around a target’s head. That target has disadvantage on its next attack roll as it swats at the annoyance.

creatures.name: Arimanius
creatures.appearance: A minor lion-headed deity, often associated with Aion or Chronos, bearing a regal mane and cosmic symbols.

attacks.name: Chrono Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom save or lose its next bonus action, as time seems to slow for them.

attacks.name: Cosmic Roar
attacks.effect: All creatures within 20 feet make a DC 15 Intelligence save or be stunned until the end of Arimanius’s next turn.

creatures.name: Ammit
creatures.appearance: A demoness with the forequarters of a lion, the hindquarters of a hippopotamus, and the head of a crocodile. Known as the devourer of the dead.

attacks.name: Devouring Maw
attacks.effect: On a hit against a creature at 0 HP or under a death effect, Ammit immediately kills and devours it. Otherwise, target must make DC 16 Strength save or be grappled.

attacks.name: Judgmental Glare
attacks.effect: One target that Ammit can see within 30 feet must make DC 15 Charisma save or be frightened and unable to heal for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Barong
creatures.appearance: A benevolent king of spirits taking the shape of a lion-like creature, adorned with rich fabrics and gold.

attacks.name: Protective Roar
attacks.effect: All allies within 30 feet gain advantage on saving throws against curses and fear for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Spirit Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 14 Wisdom save or have disadvantage on attack rolls against Barong’s allies until the end of its next turn.

creatures.name: Beast of the First Kingdom
creatures.appearance: A lion with eagle’s wings, representing the first great empire seen in prophetic visions.

attacks.name: Winged Maul
attacks.effect: On a hit, if the Beast moved at least 10 feet before attacking, it deals an extra 1d6 slashing damage.

attacks.name: Prophetic Roar
attacks.effect: All creatures within 30 feet must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be overwhelmed by visions, giving them disadvantage on their next attack roll.

creatures.name: Brunswick Lion
creatures.appearance: A legendary lion statue brought to life, symbol of loyalty and bravery, carved from stone or metal.

attacks.name: Stony Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on DC 14 Strength save or be knocked prone by the lion’s solid jaws.

attacks.name: Roar of Loyalty
attacks.effect: All allies within 20 feet gain +2 to AC for 1 round as the Brunswick Lion’s presence inspires steadfast defense.

creatures.name: Chimera
creatures.appearance: A lion’s body with a goat’s head emerging from its back and a serpent for a tail, breathing fire from the lion head.

attacks.name: Triple Strike
attacks.damage: Lion head: 2d8 piercing, Goat head: 2d6 bludgeoning (ram), Serpent tail: 2d6 poison
attacks.effect: On a successful multiattack, if all three hits land on the same target, that target must make a DC 15 Constitution save or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

attacks.name: Flame Breath
attacks.effect: A 15-foot cone of fire. Targets must make DC 14 Dexterity save or take full damage, half on success.

creatures.name: Chinese guardian lions
creatures.appearance: Stone lions placed in pairs as guardians, often ornate and stylized.

attacks.name: Stone Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Strength save or be grappled by the lion’s stone jaws.

attacks.name: Guardian’s Aura
attacks.effect: Allies within 15 feet cannot be frightened or charmed while within this aura.

creatures.name: Komainu (Shinto)
creatures.appearance: Similar to Chinese guardian lions, these temple guardians often come in pairs, one open-mouthed, one closed.

attacks.name: Temple Fang
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed DC 14 Wisdom save or be marked. Marked targets grant advantage to Komainu’s ally attacks for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Purifying Roar
attacks.effect: All allies within 30 feet are cured of one minor curse or magical fear effect.

creatures.name: Shisa (Ryukyuan)
creatures.appearance: A cross between a lion and a dog, statues come to life to protect homes.

attacks.name: Ward Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Charisma save or be unable to teleport or become invisible for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Protective Howl
attacks.effect: Allies within 20 feet gain +1 to all saving throws for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Sin-you (Japanese)
creatures.appearance: A one-horned Chinese/Japanese lion that judges guilt and innocence.

attacks.name: Judgment Horn
attacks.effect: On a hit, if target has committed a recent crime (GM discretion), Sin-you deals an extra 2d6 psychic damage.

attacks.name: Truthsnarl
attacks.effect: One creature within 30 feet must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be compelled to speak only truth for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Xiezhi (Chinese)
creatures.appearance: A one-horned creature often depicted as a goat-lion hybrid symbolizing justice and law.

attacks.name: Horn of Justice
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Charisma save or be unable to lie for 1 hour.

attacks.name: Lawkeeper’s Gaze
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Intelligence save or be unable to cast enchantment spells for 10 minutes.

creatures.name: Dawon
creatures.appearance: A sacred tiger or lion used as a mount by the goddess Durga, decorated with divine ornaments.

attacks.name: Divine Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Wisdom save or become blinded by holy light for 1 round.

attacks.name: Guardian Leap
attacks.effect: Dawon leaps next to an ally as a bonus action, granting that ally advantage on their next saving throw.

creatures.name: Egyptian lion gods
creatures.appearance: Various lioness or lion-headed gods and goddesses representing warfare, healing, and protection.

attacks.name: Divine Maul
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 16 Wisdom save or be charmed with reverent awe for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Blazing Eye
attacks.effect: A line of fire 30 feet long, DC 15 Dexterity save or take full damage. Targets failing the save also lose their next reaction.

creatures.name: Maahes
creatures.appearance: A specific Egyptian lion-headed god, associated with war and weather, wearing regal attire.

attacks.name: Razor Claw Storm
attacks.effect: On a hit, Maahes may make an immediate second claw attack at disadvantage. If it hits again, target bleeds (1d4 damage per turn until healed).

attacks.name: Thunderous Roar
attacks.effect: A 20-foot radius blast of sound. Targets must make DC 16 Constitution save or be stunned for 1 round.

creatures.name: Sekhmet
creatures.appearance: A lioness-headed warrior goddess, powerful and fearsome, often associated with the sun’s scorching heat.

attacks.name: Sun Flare
attacks.effect: A 15-foot cone of intense heat. Targets must make DC 16 Dexterity save or be blinded for 1 round.

attacks.name: Warrior’s Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 16 Strength save or drop all carried weapons due to overwhelming pain and fear.

creatures.name: Taweret
creatures.appearance: A hippopotamus-headed goddess with lion paws and a crocodile tail, protector of childbirth.

attacks.name: Protective Swipe
attacks.effect: On a hit, an ally within 5 feet of Taweret gains 2d8 temporary HP.

attacks.name: Amniotic Flood
attacks.effect: A 10-foot radius of conjured water. Targets must make DC 14 Strength save or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: Tutu
creatures.appearance: A protective deity with a composite form: lion body, human head, hawk and crocodile heads projecting from the body, serpent tail.

attacks.name: Chimera’s Fury
attacks.damage: Roll 1d4: (1) Hawk bite 3d6 slashing, (2) Crocodile snap 3d6 piercing, (3) Serpent sting 3d6 poison, (4) Lion claw 3d6 radiant
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 16 Charisma save or be dazed (no reactions) for 1 round.

attacks.name: Warding Presence
