attacks.effect: All allies within 20 feet gain advantage on saving throws vs fear and charm for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Griffin
creatures.appearance: Body of a lion with the head and wings of an eagle, guardian of treasures.

attacks.name: Lion’s Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Strength save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Eagle’s Beak
attacks.effect: On a hit, if the target is prone, deal an extra 1d8 damage.

creatures.name: Lamassu
creatures.appearance: A protective deity with a human head, the body of a lion or bull, and eagle wings.

attacks.name: Celestial Paw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed DC 15 Wisdom save or be charmed for 1 round by the lamassu’s divine presence.

attacks.name: Wing Shield
attacks.effect: Lamassu shields allies behind its wings. Allies within 10 feet gain +2 AC for 1 round.

creatures.name: Manticore
creatures.appearance: A lion with a human-like face and a scorpion or dragon-like tail loaded with poisonous spines.

attacks.name: Poison Spines
attacks.effect: Ranged 50/100 feet. On a hit, target must make DC 15 Constitution save or be poisoned for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Lion’s Lunge
attacks.effect: On a hit, if Manticore moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target, the attack deals an additional 1d6 damage.

creatures.name: Manussiha
creatures.appearance: A statue-like being with a human head and two lion hindquarters, symbolizing protection and watchfulness.

attacks.name: Protective Stance
attacks.effect: Allies within 10 feet cannot be surprised and have advantage on Initiative rolls.

attacks.name: Goading Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Charisma save or be compelled to attack Manussiha next turn if able.

creatures.name: Merlion
creatures.appearance: A creature with a lion’s head and a fish’s body, associated with maritime guardianship.

attacks.name: Tidal Roar
attacks.effect: A 15-foot cone of seawater. Targets must make DC 14 Strength save or be pushed 10 feet and knocked prone.

attacks.name: Frosted Fang
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Constitution save or have movement halved for 1 round.

creatures.name: Narasimha
creatures.appearance: A half-lion, half-man avatar of Vishnu, known for destroying evil and protecting devotees.

attacks.name: Avatar’s Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed DC 16 Wisdom save or be paralyzed with awe for 1 round.

attacks.name: Divine Roar
attacks.effect: All enemies in 20 feet make DC 15 Charisma save or drop any weapons they hold as faith-shaking fear overcomes them.

creatures.name: Nian
creatures.appearance: A beast with a lion-like body and canine face, sometimes reptilian features, warded off by New Year festivities.

attacks.name: Frightful Lunge
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 minute. Target may repeat the save at end of each turn.

attacks.name: Firecracker Fear
attacks.effect: If bright light or loud noise is present (firecrackers, etc.), Nian has disadvantage on attacks. Otherwise, Nian can roar, forcing DC 14 Wisdom save to frighten targets.

creatures.name: Werehyena
creatures.appearance: A humanoid that can transform into a hyena-like form, often associated with cunning cruelty.

attacks.name: Savage Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Constitution save or contract a werehyena curse (GM’s discretion).

attacks.name: Cackling Dread
attacks.effect: All creatures within 30 feet must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 minute, hearing the werehyena’s unearthly laughter.

creatures.name: Kishi
creatures.appearance: A demon with two faces: a handsome human face at the front and a hyena’s face at the back of its head, hidden by long hair.

attacks.name: Double-Faced Ambush
attacks.effect: If Kishi attacks a charmed or unaware target, deal an extra 1d6 psychic damage as the target’s mind reels at the reveal of the second face.

attacks.name: Hyena Maw (Rear Face)
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed DC 15 Wisdom save or be charmed by the human face if they see it next turn, conflicted by the dual nature.

creatures.name: Azeban
creatures.appearance: A raccoon trickster spirit, small and nimble with intelligent eyes and a mischievous grin.

attacks.name: Trickster’s Swipe
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Intelligence save or be confused (as Confusion spell) for 1 round as Azeban chitters mockingly.

attacks.name: Bait and Switch
attacks.effect: Azeban distracts a target within 15 feet. That target has disadvantage on its next attack roll as it chases the illusion of stolen treats.

creatures.name: Gef
creatures.appearance: A talking mongoose, small and furry, often unseen but heard, known for trickery and gossip.

attacks.name: Ventriloquist Whisper
attacks.effect: Forces DC 14 Charisma save. On fail, target is distracted, granting advantage to Gef’s allies’ next attacks against that target.

attacks.name: Nipping Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed DC 12 Wisdom save or spend its next action searching fruitlessly for Gef, who can Hide as a bonus action.

creatures.name: Ichneumon
creatures.appearance: A mongoose-like creature known for battling snakes and dragons, nimble and fierce.

attacks.name: Serpent Slayer
attacks.effect: On a hit against a reptilian or draconic creature, Ichneumon deals an extra 1d8 damage.

attacks.name: Swift Dodge
attacks.effect: As a reaction when attacked, Ichneumon gains +2 AC against that attack. On success, it can move 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

creatures.name: Kamaitachi
creatures.appearance: Weasel-like yōkai riding on winds, invisible slashing claws, often appearing as a trio.

attacks.name: Wind Slash
attacks.effect: Ranged 30 feet. Targets must make DC 14 Dexterity save or be knocked prone by sudden gusts.

attacks.name: Trio Ambush
attacks.effect: If three Kamaitachi work together, their combined attack deals an extra 2d8 slashing and leaves the target bleeding (1d4 damage at start of each turn until healed).

creatures.name: Kushtaka
creatures.appearance: A shapeshifting “land otter man” capable of mimicking human cries to lure victims.

attacks.name: Luring Cry
attacks.effect: One humanoid within 60 feet must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be charmed, approaching Kushtaka’s location, losing their reaction this round.

attacks.name: Otter Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Dexterity save or drop a held item as slick otter fur confuses their grip.

creatures.name: Mujina
creatures.appearance: A shapeshifting badger or raccoon dog that can disguise itself as a human with a smooth, featureless face.

attacks.name: Faceless Terror
attacks.effect: One target within 30 feet must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 minute, seeing the Mujina’s blank visage.

attacks.name: Bite and Vanish
attacks.effect: On a hit, Mujina can immediately take the Hide action as a bonus action.

creatures.name: Ramidreju
creatures.appearance: A long, weasel-like creature with green fur, born every hundred years from a weasel’s womb. Its fur and body have healing properties.

attacks.name: Fur of Remedy
attacks.effect: As an action, Ramidreju can heal an ally for 3d8 hit points. If used offensively, touching an undead deals 3d8 radiant damage instead.

attacks.name: Nimble Dart
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Constitution save or lose its next reaction as the Ramidreju’s unexpected speed disorients.

creatures.name: Raijū
creatures.appearance: A thunder beast, often weasel or cat-like, made of lightning or wrapped in crackling electricity.

attacks.name: Lightning Pounce
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Constitution save or be stunned for 1 round as electricity surges through their body.

attacks.name: Thunder Roll
attacks.effect: A 20-foot radius boom. Targets must make DC 14 Strength save or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: Azeban (detailed above)
creatures.note: Already described under musteloids for convenience.

creatures.name: Mermaid / Merman
creatures.appearance: Humanoid upper body with a fish tail. Graceful, alluring, and often magical.

attacks.name: Siren Song
attacks.effect: All humanoids within 60 feet must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be charmed, moving toward the mermaid/merman.

attacks.name: Trident Jab
attacks.effect: On a hit, if underwater, target must succeed DC 13 Strength save or be pushed 5 feet and start suffocating if they can’t breathe water.

creatures.name: Water spirit (Undine)
creatures.appearance: A graceful water elemental in humanoid form, skin shimmering like water’s surface.

attacks.name: Drenching Embrace
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Strength save or be grappled. While grappled, they start suffocating if they cannot breathe water.

attacks.name: Hydroblast
attacks.effect: A 30-foot line of high-pressure water. Targets must make DC 14 Dexterity save or be knocked prone and pushed 10 feet.

creatures.name: Abaia
creatures.appearance: A giant eel-like fish that guards its lake fiercely, black and shimmering.

attacks.name: Whirlpool Tail
attacks.effect: A 15-foot radius whirlpool forms. Targets inside must make DC 15 Strength save or be pulled 10 feet toward the Abaia and knocked prone.

attacks.name: Lightning Scales
attacks.effect: On a hit, if in water, lightning spreads. All creatures within 10 feet must make DC 14 Dexterity save or take half damage.

creatures.name: Gurangatch
creatures.appearance: A giant eel-like creature with amphibious traits, said to carve out rivers.

attacks.name: Quicksand Swirl
attacks.effect: A 10-foot radius of soft mud forms. Targets inside must make DC 14 Strength save or be restrained by mud.

attacks.name: Crushing Maw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed DC 15 Strength save or be grappled in its powerful jaws.

creatures.name: Hippocamp
creatures.appearance: A horse with a fish’s tail, already described above in aquatic mammals section, but can appear under fish due to its tail.
creatures.note: See previous entry under aquatic mammals for stats.

creatures.name: Ika-Roa
creatures.appearance: A giant cosmic fish or eel that created the Milky Way, shimmering with starlight.

attacks.name: Starlight Torrent
attacks.effect: A 20-foot radius surge of luminous water. Targets must make DC 15 Constitution save or be blinded for 1 round.

attacks.name: Cosmic Current
attacks.effect: Ika-Roa alters currents. Until the end of its next turn, all creatures swimming within 30 feet move at half speed.

creatures.name: Il Belliegha
creatures.appearance: An eel-like monster with a frog’s tongue and a hand at the tip of its tail, lurks in wells.

attacks.name: Tadpole Tongue
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Strength save or be pulled 10 feet closer.

attacks.name: Hand Grab
attacks.effect: A hand at its tail attempts to grab a victim. On a hit, target is grappled (escape DC 14). While grappled, target takes 1d6 damage each turn.

creatures.name: Isonade
creatures.appearance: A huge shark-like monster with barbed fins, dwelling deep in the ocean.

attacks.name: Fin Slash
attacks.effect: On a hit, if the target is on a boat, the boat takes equal damage. If in water, target must make DC 15 Strength save or be pulled underwater.

attacks.name: Wave Crash
attacks.effect: Isonade slams the surface, creating a 20-foot radius wave. Targets must make DC 14 Dexterity save or be knocked prone and pushed 10 feet.

creatures.name: Namazu
creatures.appearance: A giant catfish said to cause earthquakes when it thrashes underground.

attacks.name: Earthshaker Tail
attacks.effect: A 30-foot radius quake. All creatures on the ground must make DC 15 Dexterity save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Mud Spit
attacks.effect: A glob of mud. On a hit, target must make DC 14 Strength save or be restrained by thick mud until they use an action to free themselves.

creatures.name: Ningyo
creatures.appearance: A fish-human hybrid, smaller than a mermaid, considered an omen of longevity or disaster.

attacks.name: Song of Fortune
attacks.effect: One creature within 30 feet must make DC 14 Wisdom save. On success, gain +2 to next saving throw. On fail, disadvantage on next saving throw.

attacks.name: Iridescent Scales
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Constitution save or be charmed for 1 round by Ningyo’s shimmering beauty.

creatures.name: Kun (Peng)
creatures.appearance: A giant fish that transforms into the Peng bird. As Kun, it’s enormous, dark-scaled, and wise.

attacks.name: Whale-like Maw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 16 Strength save or be swallowed whole. Swallowed target is blinded, restrained, and takes 2d8 acid damage each turn.

attacks.name: Transform (Peng)
attacks.effect: As an action, Kun transforms into Peng, a giant bird form. In Peng form, it gains flight and different attacks (see Peng in birds section).

creatures.name: Salmon of Wisdom
creatures.appearance: An ordinary-looking salmon said to contain all the world’s knowledge.

attacks.name: Scales of Insight
attacks.effect: One ally who eats a scale gains advantage on all Intelligence checks for 1 hour. Offensively, if forced, can blind a foe with shimmering scales (DC 13 Con save or blinded 1 round).

attacks.name: Slippery Escape
attacks.effect: Salmon can take the Disengage action as a bonus action and move through enemies’ spaces without provoking opportunity attacks.

creatures.name: Shachihoko
creatures.appearance: A creature with the head of a tiger and the body of a carp. Often used as a roof ornament to ward off fire.

attacks.name: Tiger Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Strength save or drop one held item, startled by the sudden ferocity.

attacks.name: Rain Summon
attacks.effect: Shachihoko summons rain in a 30-foot radius. The area becomes difficult terrain for non-aquatic creatures, and fire-based attacks deal half damage for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Lavellan
creatures.appearance: A mythological water shrew-like creature, larger than a rat, with toxic fur that can harm livestock from a distance.

attacks.name: Toxic Aura
attacks.effect: All creatures within 10 feet must make a DC 13 Constitution save or be poisoned for 1 minute. Poisoned creatures take 1d4 poison damage at the start of their turns.

attacks.name: Venomous Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution save or have disadvantage on Strength and Dexterity checks for 1 hour.

creatures.name: Drop Bear
creatures.appearance: A large, vicious, carnivorous koala-like creature that ambushes prey from above.

attacks.name: Drop Ambush
attacks.effect: If the Drop Bear is hidden in a tree, it can drop onto a target below. On a hit, target must make DC 14 Strength save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Razor Claws
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Constitution save or bleed (1d4 damage at the start of each turn until healed).

creatures.name: Bunyip
creatures.appearance: A water-dwelling creature, its form varies but often a mix of seals, dogs, and waterfowl features. Haunts billabongs and swamps.

attacks.name: Aquatic Lunge
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Strength save or be dragged 10 feet into the water.

attacks.name: Dreadful Bellow
attacks.effect: All creatures within 30 feet must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 minute. Creatures can repeat the save at the end of their turns.

creatures.name: Akkorokamui
creatures.appearance: A giant octopus or squid-like being with crimson skin and enormous size, sometimes glowing.

attacks.name: Tentacle Crush
attacks.effect: On a hit, target is grappled (escape DC 15). While grappled, target takes 2d6 bludgeoning at the start of its turn.

attacks.name: Ink Cloud
attacks.effect: A 20-foot radius ink cloud forces DC 14 Constitution save or creatures are blinded until they leave the cloud. Akkorokamui can move freely within.

creatures.name: Carbuncle (bivalve form)
creatures.appearance: A luminescent clam-like creature with a gemstone glow inside its shell.

attacks.name: Pearl Snap
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed DC 13 Dexterity save or drop a random carried item as the shell snaps shut loudly.

attacks.name: Radiant Gleam
attacks.effect: A flash of light forces DC 14 Wisdom save. On fail, target is blinded for 1 round and has disadvantage on Perception checks.

creatures.name: Lou Carcolh
creatures.appearance: A giant snail with hairy tentacles and a massive shell, lurking in caves and tunnels.

attacks.name: Tentacle Grab
attacks.effect: On a hit, target is grappled (escape DC 14). While grappled, target takes 1d6 acid damage per turn as Carcolh’s slime begins to dissolve clothes and gear.

attacks.name: Slime Trail
attacks.effect: A 10-foot path behind the Carcolh becomes difficult terrain. Creatures entering it must make DC 13 Dexterity save or fall prone.

creatures.name: Kraken
creatures.appearance: A colossal squid-like sea monster with enormous tentacles, often capable of sinking ships.

attacks.name: Crushing Tentacle
attacks.effect: On a hit, target is grappled (escape DC 18). Grappled targets take 2d8 bludgeoning each round.

attacks.name: Lightning Storm
attacks.effect: A 20-foot radius storm centered on a point in water. Targets make DC 16 Dexterity save or take full damage, half on success.

creatures.name: Shen
creatures.appearance: A clam-dragon hybrid that creates illusions and mirages. A giant clam with draconic features.

attacks.name: Illusory Mirage
attacks.effect: Forces all creatures within 60 feet to make DC 15 Intelligence save or see illusory landmasses or threats, imposing disadvantage on attack rolls for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Shell Slam
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Strength save or be knocked prone as the massive shell snaps shut.

creatures.name: Agropelter
creatures.appearance: A wiry, ape-like creature dwelling in hollow trees, flinging branches at passersby.

attacks.name: Branch Fling
attacks.effect: Ranged attack 30/60 ft. On a hit, target must make DC 13 Dexterity save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Hollow Hide
attacks.effect: Agropelter can Hide as a bonus action while in trees. Its first attack out of hiding is at advantage.

creatures.name: Bigfoot (Sasquatch)
creatures.appearance: A large, bipedal ape-like humanoid covered in thick fur, elusive and strong.

attacks.name: Powerful Slam
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Strength save or be pushed 10 feet.

attacks.name: Rock Throw
attacks.effect: Ranged 30/60 ft. On a hit, target must make DC 13 Dexterity save or be knocked prone as the rock strikes with force.

creatures.name: Hibagon (Hinagon)
creatures.appearance: A smaller bigfoot-like creature, ape-like, with a foul smell and sometimes red-brown fur.

attacks.name: Fetid Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Constitution save or be poisoned for 1 round due to noxious odor.

attacks.name: Muddy Throw
attacks.effect: Hibagon throws mud in a 15-foot cone. Targets make DC 12 Dexterity save or be blinded until they use an action to clear their eyes.

creatures.name: Jué yuán
creatures.appearance: A blue-furred, man-sized rhesus monkey that abducts human women. Agile and cunning.

attacks.name: Grappling Grab
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Strength save or be grappled. Jué yuán focuses on kidnapping its target.

attacks.name: Shrill Screech
attacks.effect: All within 20 feet make DC 13 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 round.

creatures.name: Satori
creatures.appearance: A mind-reading ape or monkey that can speak and reveal a traveler’s thoughts.

attacks.name: Mindread Lunge
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Charisma save or have disadvantage on their next saving throw as Satori anticipates their moves.

attacks.name: Echoed Thoughts
attacks.effect: Force one target within 30 feet to make DC 15 Wisdom save or lose its next bonus action, overwhelmed by hearing its own thoughts aloud.

creatures.name: Shōjō
creatures.appearance: A red-furred, sea-dwelling ape, fond of alcohol and mischief.

attacks.name: Drunken Fist
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Dexterity save or be knocked prone as Shōjō fights with unpredictable drunken style.

attacks.name: Sake Splash
attacks.effect: A 15-foot cone of fermented sake spray. Targets fail DC 14 Constitution save or be poisoned for 1 minute, giggling uncontrollably.

creatures.name: Shug Monkey
creatures.appearance: A monkey-dog hybrid already described under canines. (See previous entry.)

creatures.name: Sun Wukong
creatures.appearance: A powerful monkey king born from a stone egg, wielding a magic staff and gifted with many abilities.

attacks.name: Ruyi Jingu Bang Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 16 Strength save or be pushed 10 feet. Sun Wukong can change the staff’s size at will.

attacks.name: 72 Transformations
attacks.effect: Sun Wukong takes the form of a beast or object (as Polymorph, self-only). His next attack after reverting deals +1d8 damage.

creatures.name: Vanara
creatures.appearance: Humanoid apes or monkeys, intelligent and often virtuous, allies of heroes.

attacks.name: Staff Whirl
attacks.effect: On a hit, if there is an ally adjacent to the target, that ally may make an immediate melee attack as a reaction.

attacks.name: Chattering Rally
attacks.effect: All Vanara allies within 30 feet gain advantage on their next attack roll as they are inspired by communal chatter.

creatures.name: Yeren
creatures.appearance: A hominid-like creature, similar to Bigfoot, hairy and elusive, living in mountainous forests.

attacks.name: Rock Bash
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Constitution save or be staggered, losing their next reaction.

attacks.name: Forest Blend
attacks.effect: Yeren camouflages in forest terrain. It gains advantage on Stealth checks and its first attack out of hiding deals +1d6 damage.

creatures.name: Yeti
creatures.appearance: A large ape-like humanoid adapted to cold climates, white fur, and fierce strength.

attacks.name: Chilling Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Constitution save or have its speed halved due to numbing frost for 1 round.

attacks.name: Ice Roar
attacks.effect: All creatures within 30 feet must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be frightened, seeing visions of blizzards and avalanches.

creatures.name: Yowie
creatures.appearance: A hominid cryptid similar to a Bigfoot, with large feet, wild hair, and strong build.

attacks.name: Ground Pound
attacks.effect: A 10-foot radius quake. Targets must make DC 14 Dexterity save or fall prone.

attacks.name: Intimidating Howl
attacks.effect: Forces DC 14 Charisma save. On fail, target is too shaken to take the Attack action on its next turn (can still move or cast spells).

creatures.name: Al-Mi'raj
creatures.appearance: A cute yellow rabbit with a single, spiraling unicorn horn on its forehead.

attacks.name: Horn Gore
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Constitution save or be stunned for 1 round, surprised by the rabbit’s fierce attack.

attacks.name: Hop Dodge
attacks.effect: Al-Mi'raj can use its reaction to move 10 feet away without provoking opportunity attacks.

creatures.name: Jackalope
creatures.appearance: A jackrabbit with antelope horns, quick and tricky.

attacks.name: Horned Leap
attacks.effect: If Jackalope moves at least 20 feet before attacking, it deals an extra 1d6 damage and target must make DC 13 Strength save or fall prone.

attacks.name: Mimic Voice
attacks.effect: Forces DC 14 Wisdom save. On fail, target is distracted, granting Jackalope advantage on its next attack.

creatures.name: Moon Rabbit
creatures.appearance: A white rabbit that dwells on the moon, associated with making elixirs of immortality.

attacks.name: Celestial Powder
attacks.effect: Heals an ally for 2d8 hit points, or if used offensively, blinds a foe with glowing dust (DC 14 Dex save or blinded 1 round).

attacks.name: Moonlit Hop
attacks.effect: Moon Rabbit can teleport up to 20 feet in moonlight. Next attack it makes deals +1d4 radiant damage.

creatures.name: Skvader
creatures.appearance: A hybrid between a hare and a wood grouse, having wings and hindparts of a hare.

attacks.name: Wing Slap
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 12 Strength save or drop a held object as it fumbles from the unexpected strike.

attacks.name: Aerial Scamper
attacks.effect: Skvader flies 10 feet upward, forcing attackers to make ranged attacks or climb to engage. Its next attack has advantage.

creatures.name: Wisakedjak (Whiskeyjack, Rabbit Trickster)
creatures.appearance: A rabbit trickster spirit, clever and mischievous.

attacks.name: Illusory Decoy
attacks.effect: Forces DC 14 Intelligence save. On fail, target attacks an illusory duplicate, wasting its attack this turn.

attacks.name: Thumping Kick
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Dexterity save or be knocked prone as the rabbit’s powerful hind legs strike.

creatures.name: Wolpertinger
creatures.appearance: A horned rabbit with wings and sometimes fangs, a whimsical chimera.

attacks.name: Winged Charge
attacks.effect: On a hit, if Wolpertinger flew at least 10 feet, target must make DC 13 Strength save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Confusing Presence
attacks.effect: All creatures within 20 feet make DC 14 Wisdom save or have disadvantage on their next Perception check, puzzled by the bizarre creature.

creatures.name: Agoa
creatures.appearance: A turtle-like monster with a thick shell, gnarled features, and slimy moss growing on its back.

attacks.name: Shell Slam
attacks.effect: On a hit, the target must make a DC 14 Strength save or be knocked prone. If prone, Agoa may move over the target, dealing 1d8 bludgeoning damage.

attacks.name: Mossy Snap
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution save or have disadvantage on attack rolls for 1 round due to mossy, foul-tasting bite.

creatures.name: Ammut
creatures.appearance: Also known as Ammit (already covered under Lions). Her reptilian portion can be emphasized: crocodilian jaws, lion’s forepart, hippo’s rear. (See lion entry for attacks.)

creatures.name: Bakunawa
creatures.appearance: A serpent-like dragon with a mouth large enough to swallow the moon, shimmering scales, and whisker-like tendrils.

attacks.name: Lunar Maw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Strength save or be swallowed if Medium or smaller. Swallowed creatures take 2d8 acid damage at the start of each of Bakunawa’s turns.

attacks.name: Moon Eclipse
attacks.effect: A 20-foot radius darkness centered on Bakunawa. Targets inside must make DC 16 Wisdom save or be frightened until they leave the area.

creatures.name: Basilisk
creatures.appearance: A small reptilian monster with a crown-like crest, capable of killing with its gaze.

attacks.name: Petrifying Gaze
attacks.effect: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet and can see Basilisk’s eyes must make DC 13 Constitution save or begin turning to stone. On a failed save at the start of its next turn, it’s fully petrified.

attacks.name: Venomous Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Constitution save or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned, target’s speed is halved.

creatures.name: Black Tortoise
creatures.appearance: A tortoise entwined with a serpent, representing the north and winter, often depicted with mystical patterns on its shell.

attacks.name: Icy Shell Bash
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Constitution save or have its speed halved for 1 minute due to numbing cold.

attacks.name: Serpent Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed DC 15 Constitution save or be poisoned for 1 minute. The poison deals 1d6 damage each turn until cured.

creatures.name: Cipactli
creatures.appearance: A monstrous crocodilian-fish-toad hybrid with countless mouths along its body, forever hungry.

attacks.name: Many-Mouthed Maw
attacks.effect: On a hit, roll a d4. On a 4, the target takes an additional 2d6 piercing damage as multiple mouths latch on simultaneously.

attacks.name: Devour Earth
attacks.effect: Cipactli gnaws at the ground, creating difficult terrain in a 20-foot radius. Creatures moving through it must make DC 14 Dexterity save or fall prone.

creatures.name: Dragon
creatures.appearance: A large reptilian creature, often winged, with various breath weapons depending on type. (Too many variants to list all; choose a general example.)

attacks.name: Fire Breath (Red Dragon example)
attacks.effect: A 30-foot cone. Targets make DC 16 Dexterity save or take full damage, half on success.

attacks.name: Draconic Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Strength save or be knocked prone by the dragon’s massive jaws.

creatures.name: Dungavenhooter
creatures.appearance: A crocodile-like beast with no mouth, huge nostrils, and uses its tail to vaporize victims into inhalable mist.

attacks.name: Tail Pound
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Constitution save or be knocked unconscious for 1 round as their breath is knocked out.

attacks.name: Vaporize
attacks.effect: If a target is at 0 HP and fails two death saves in Dungavenhooter’s presence, it can vaporize the body to heal 3d8 HP.

creatures.name: Knucker
creatures.appearance: A kind of water-dragon or wyrm dwelling in knuckerholes (water-filled pits). Slimy and serpentine.

attacks.name: Watery Coil
attacks.effect: On a hit, target is grappled (escape DC 14). While grappled, target takes 1d6 drowning damage each turn if submerged.

attacks.name: Acidic Spit
attacks.effect: A 20-foot line. Targets must make DC 14 Dexterity save or take full damage and have their armor’s AC reduced by 1 (nonmagical).

creatures.name: Kurma
creatures.appearance: The tortoise avatar of Vishnu, cosmic and vast, often supports mountains on its back.

attacks.name: Shell of Creation
attacks.effect: All allies within 30 feet gain +2 to all saves for 1 minute. If used offensively (rarely), Kurma can slam the ground: DC 15 Strength save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Divine Snap
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Wisdom save or be stunned for 1 round by the cosmic authority Kurma represents.

creatures.name: Loch Ness Monster
creatures.appearance: A plesiosaur-like creature with a long neck, small head, and large body lurking in deep lakes.

attacks.name: Neck Lash
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Strength save or be knocked back 5 feet into the water, if near the lake.

attacks.name: Silent Dive
attacks.effect: Loch Ness Monster submerges. Next attack made from underwater is at advantage, and on a hit deals +1d6 damage.

creatures.name: Loveland Frog
creatures.appearance: A small, bipedal frog-like humanoid wielding a wand that sparks faint magical energy.

attacks.name: Wand Spark
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 12 Constitution save or be shocked, losing its next reaction.

attacks.name: Sticky Tongue
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 12 Strength save or be pulled 5 feet closer. If pulled into melee range, Loveland Frog attacks at advantage next turn.

creatures.name: Makara
creatures.appearance: Already covered under Aquatic mammals, but also considered reptilian (see previous entry).

creatures.name: Mokele Mbembe
creatures.appearance: A large, sauropod-like reptile dwelling in swamps and rivers, shy but strong.

attacks.name: Tail Sweep
attacks.effect: A 15-foot cone. Targets must make DC 15 Dexterity save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Stomp
attacks.effect: On a hit against a prone target, deals an extra 1d6 damage. Target must make DC 14 Constitution save or be stunned for 1 round.

creatures.name: Moʻo
creatures.appearance: Shapeshifting lizard spirits, can appear as large black lizards or beautiful women.

attacks.name: Illusory Charm
attacks.effect: One target within 30 feet makes DC 15 Wisdom save or is charmed, seeing Moʻo as an ally. While charmed, target won’t attack Moʻo.

attacks.name: Lizard Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, if Moʻo is near water, it can drag the target into water (DC 13 Strength save to resist) for potential drowning.

creatures.name: Morgawr
creatures.appearance: A crocodile-like sea serpent that disrupts fishing, has a long neck and humps.

attacks.name: Fisher’s Ruin
attacks.effect: On a hit against a boat or fishing gear, the equipment is destroyed. Against creatures, on a hit, target must make DC 13 Strength save or lose any fishing nets or poles they carry.

attacks.name: Hump Crash
attacks.effect: Morgawr rises and falls on the surface, creating waves. Creatures on small boats in a 20-foot radius must make DC 14 Dexterity save or fall overboard.

creatures.name: Mungoon-Gali
creatures.appearance: A giant goanna (monitor lizard) often of enormous size, lurking in rocky escarpments.

attacks.name: Rending Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed DC 13 Constitution save or be infected with minor venom causing disadvantage on Dexterity checks for 1 hour.

attacks.name: Rock Scramble
attacks.effect: Mungoon-Gali climbs swiftly. Gains advantage on next attack if it strikes from higher ground.

creatures.name: Peluda
creatures.appearance: A dragon-like beast with green quills, multiple legs, and a venomous tail, said to cause floods.

attacks.name: Poison Quills
attacks.effect: 30-foot cone of quills. Targets must make DC 15 Dexterity save or be poisoned for 1 minute. Poisoned creatures take 1d4 poison damage each turn.

attacks.name: Flood Tail
attacks.effect: If near water, Peluda lashes its tail, causing a sudden wave. Targets in 20-foot radius must make DC 14 Strength save or be knocked prone and pushed 10 feet.

creatures.name: Reptilian humanoids
creatures.appearance: General category for Lizardfolk, Serpent-Men, etc.

attacks.name: Spear Thrust
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must succeed DC 13 Strength save or drop a carried shield.

attacks.name: Serpent Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 12 Constitution save or be poisoned for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Sewer alligator
creatures.appearance: An alligator adapted to sewers, with pale scales and milky eyes.

attacks.name: Filthy Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 13 Constitution save or contract a disease, causing disadvantage on Strength checks for 24 hours.

attacks.name: Tail Sweep
attacks.effect: A 10-foot cone. Targets must make DC 12 Dexterity save or fall prone.

creatures.name: Sobek
creatures.appearance: A crocodile-headed god, muscular human body, wearing a crown and carrying a scepter.

attacks.name: Divine Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Wisdom save or be charmed by Sobek’s overwhelming divinity for 1 round.

attacks.name: Nile’s Protection
attacks.effect: Allies within 20 feet gain resistance to fire and poison damage for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Taniwha
creatures.appearance: A water-dwelling dragon or serpent with limbs, guardian or monster depending on locale.

attacks.name: Guardian’s Maw
attacks.effect: If Taniwha is protecting a specific place or person, it deals an extra 1d8 radiant damage to intruders.

attacks.name: Whirlpool Shield
attacks.effect: Creates a swirling current around itself. Ranged attacks against Taniwha are at disadvantage for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Whowie
creatures.appearance: A giant, frog-headed goanna with six legs, enormous and slow, lurking in caves.

attacks.name: Six-Legged Slam
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Strength save or be knocked prone beneath its bulk.

attacks.name: Acid Tongue
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Dex save or target’s armor/weapons suffer a -1 penalty as acid corrodes them.

creatures.name: Wyvern
creatures.appearance: A two-legged dragon with a barbed tail, smaller than a true dragon, deadly flyer.

attacks.name: Venomous Stinger
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Con save or be poisoned for 1 minute, taking 1d6 poison damage each turn.

attacks.name: Aerial Drop
attacks.effect: If Wyvern grapples a target, it can fly up and drop them, forcing DC 14 Dexterity save or take falling damage.

creatures.name: Zaratan
creatures.appearance: A colossal turtle-like creature, often mistaken for an island.

attacks.name: Island Quake
attacks.effect: A 30-foot radius tremor. Targets must make DC 16 Strength save or fall prone. Structures take double damage.

attacks.name: Gargantuan Snap
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 17 Strength save or be swallowed whole. Inside Zaratan’s maw, target takes 3d8 acid damage each turn.

creatures.name: Alicante
creatures.appearance: A serpent-like creature sometimes associated with brewing milk or odd alchemy, small and elusive.

attacks.name: Envenomed Nip
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 12 Constitution save or be poisoned for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Slither Away
attacks.effect: Alicante can Disengage as a bonus action and move through spaces as narrow as 1 inch.

creatures.name: Amphisbaena
creatures.appearance: A serpent with a head at each end, allowing it to move in both directions.

attacks.name: Double Bite
attacks.effect: Roll to hit twice (once for each head). If both hits land, target must make DC 14 Con save or be paralyzed 1 round.

attacks.name: Circular Coil
attacks.effect: On a hit, Amphisbaena coils around a target. Target is grappled (escape DC 13) and takes 1d6 bludgeoning each turn.

creatures.name: Amphithere
creatures.appearance: A winged serpent with no legs, often depicted with colorful feathers and bat-like wings.

attacks.name: Aerial Strike
attacks.effect: If Amphithere attacked from flight, target must make DC 14 Dex save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Venom Spit
attacks.effect: 30-foot line. Targets make DC 14 Con save or be blinded for 1 round by stinging venom.

creatures.name: Apep/Apophis
creatures.appearance: A giant serpent of chaos, huge and terrifying, associated with darkness and the underworld.

attacks.name: Cosmic Constriction
attacks.effect: On a hit, target is grappled (escape DC 17). While grappled, target takes 2d6 necrotic at the start of each of its turns.

attacks.name: Eclipse Breath
attacks.effect: A 30-foot cone of shadowy energy. Targets make DC 16 Constitution save or be frightened and blinded for 1 minute (save ends each turn).

creatures.name: Azhi Dahaka
creatures.appearance: A monstrous three-headed dragon or snake-like demon, breathing fire and venom.

attacks.name: Triple Headed Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 16 Con save or suffer disadvantage on saves vs spells for 1 round due to overwhelming elemental energies.

attacks.name: World-Corrupting Breath
attacks.effect: 30-foot cone. Targets failing DC 16 Con save also take 2d6 necrotic damage and are poisoned for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Biscione
creatures.appearance: A large serpent devouring a human or child, symbolic and heraldic.

attacks.name: Devouring Maw
attacks.effect: On a hit, if target is Small or smaller, DC 15 Strength save or be swallowed. Swallowed creatures take 2d6 acid damage each turn.

attacks.name: Heraldic Intimidation
attacks.effect: All creatures within 20 feet must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Drake
creatures.appearance: A smaller, wingless dragon-like creature, tougher scales, and strong bite.

attacks.name: Iron Scales
attacks.effect: Drake gains +2 AC this round. If it takes the Dodge action, it can also reflect 1d6 damage back to melee attackers.

attacks.name: Savage Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Strength save or target drops a held weapon as the jaw pressure shocks them.

creatures.name: Echidna (Greek)
creatures.appearance: Mother of monsters, half-woman, half-snake.

attacks.name: Poisoned Kiss
attacks.effect: On a hit (melee spell attack), target must make DC 15 Con save or be poisoned. While poisoned, target has disadvantage on Strength checks.

attacks.name: Spawn Monstrosity
attacks.effect: Once per day, Echidna summons a lesser monster (GM’s choice: a giant snake or lesser drake) under her control for 1 hour.

creatures.name: Fáfnir
creatures.appearance: A dwarf turned into a dragon, greed-driven, poison-breathing.

attacks.name: Poison Breath
attacks.effect: A 30-foot cone. Targets DC 16 Con save or be poisoned for 1 minute and take 1d6 poison damage each turn.

attacks.name: Greedy Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Wisdom save or feel compulsion to drop valuables, distracted by Fáfnir’s aura of greed.

creatures.name: Feathered serpent
creatures.appearance: A serpent with quetzal feathers along its body, often wise and benevolent.

attacks.name: Feather Flurry
attacks.effect: A 20-foot cone of whirling feathers. Targets must make DC 14 Dex save or be blinded for 1 round.

attacks.name: Healing Winds
attacks.effect: Feathered serpent can heal an ally within 30 feet for 3d8 HP. Offensively, can choose to withhold healing, causing attacker disadvantage on next attack.

creatures.name: Garafena (Russian)
creatures.appearance: A serpent-like dragon or snake, often poisonous and living near water.

attacks.name: Venomous Coil
attacks.effect: On a hit, target is grappled (DC 14 escape). Grappled target takes 1d6 poison damage at start of turn.

attacks.name: Hissing Fear
attacks.effect: All creatures within 15 feet must make DC 13 Wis save or be frightened until end of next turn.

creatures.name: Gorgon (including Medusa) (Greek)
creatures.appearance: A serpent-haired woman whose gaze turns flesh to stone.

attacks.name: Petrifying Gaze
attacks.effect: Each creature starting turn within 30 feet makes DC 14 Con save or start turning to stone. A second failed save fully petrifies.

attacks.name: Snake Hair
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Con save or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned, target’s speed is halved.

creatures.name: Hoop snake
creatures.appearance: A snake that bites its tail and rolls like a hoop, chasing prey at high speed.

attacks.name: Rolling Charge
attacks.effect: Hoop snake moves up to 60 feet in a straight line. Targets in its path must make DC 13 Dex save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Venomous Sting
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Con save or be poisoned. While poisoned, target’s Dexterity checks are at disadvantage.

creatures.name: Indus worm
creatures.appearance: A large worm-like serpent said to live in rivers, possibly venomous.

attacks.name: Slime Spray
attacks.effect: A 15-foot cone of slime. Targets DC 13 Dex save or be restrained by sticky goo until they use an action to free themselves.

attacks.name: Boring Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 14 Strength save or drop one carried shield as the worm’s gnawing disarms them.

creatures.name: Hydra (Greek)
creatures.appearance: A multi-headed serpent. When one head is cut off, two may grow back unless prevented by fire.

attacks.name: Multi-Headed Strike
attacks.effect: For each head, one attack. If a head is cut off, two grow back next turn unless cauterized. DC 15 Con save to resist poison from any bite.

attacks.name: Regenerative Blood
attacks.effect: At end of its turn, Hydra regains 2d6 HP per head alive. If fire damage was dealt this turn, no regeneration occurs.

creatures.name: Jaculus/Jaculi
creatures.appearance: A small winged serpent that darts from trees to impale prey.

attacks.name: Tree Dart
attacks.effect: If Jaculus attacks from hiding in a tree, target makes DC 13 Wis save or be surprised and can’t react this round.

attacks.name: Rapid Retreat
attacks.effect: After attacking, Jaculus can move half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

creatures.name: Jasconius/Jasconius
creatures.appearance: A giant fish or whale-like sea monster (sometimes considered serpentine) mistaken for an island.

attacks.name: False Island Trap
attacks.effect: Creatures resting on Jasconius must make DC 14 Dex save when it submerges or fall into the ocean, taking 2d6 bludgeoning from waves.

attacks.name: Massive Maw
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Strength save or be swallowed. Inside, target takes 2d8 acid damage each turn.

creatures.name: Jörmungandr
creatures.appearance: The Midgard Serpent, enormous, encircling the world, poisonous and colossal.

attacks.name: World-Coil Crush
attacks.effect: On a hit, if target is a structure or ship, deal double damage. If creature, DC 17 Str save or grappled, taking 3d6 bludgeoning each turn.

attacks.name: Poisonous Breath
attacks.effect: A 60-foot cone. Targets DC 17 Con save or be poisoned for 1 minute and blinded for 1 round.

creatures.name: Lamia (serpent form considered, though usually half-woman)
creatures.appearance: A half-woman, half-serpent who preys on children’s souls.

attacks.name: Soul Drain
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Wis save or lose a Hit Die (or take 2d6 extra necrotic if no HD). Lamia regains HP equal to half drained.

attacks.name: Serpentine Charm
attacks.effect: One humanoid within 30 feet DC 14 Cha save or be charmed, obeying Lamia’s commands for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Lindworm
creatures.appearance: A wingless serpent-like dragon with two forelimbs, known for its toxic bite.

attacks.name: Toxic Fang
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Con save or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned, target’s speed is halved.

attacks.name: Burrowing Rush
attacks.effect: Lindworm can burrow through soft earth. If it emerges under a target, that target must make DC 13 Dex save or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: Madame White Snake
creatures.appearance: A benevolent snake spirit taking the form of a beautiful woman, skilled in magic.

attacks.name: Healing Herbs
attacks.effect: Heals an ally for 3d8 HP. Offensively, can cast a charm: DC 15 Wis save or target is charmed for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Serpentine Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Con save or be poisoned for 1 round.

creatures.name: Meretseger
creatures.appearance: A cobra-goddess who oversees justice, punishing the wicked.

attacks.name: Venomous Judgment
attacks.effect: On a hit, if target has committed a recent injustice, DC 15 Cha save or be blinded by guilt for 1 round.

attacks.name: Bite of Penance
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Wis save or be cursed: disadvantage on attack rolls for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Mongolian Death Worm
creatures.appearance: A large, blood-red worm said to spit acid and generate electricity.

attacks.name: Acidic Spit
attacks.effect: A 20-foot line. DC 14 Dex save or target’s armor takes -1 AC if nonmagical. Creatures also take full damage on fail.

attacks.name: Electric Shock
attacks.effect: Melee range. On a hit, DC 14 Con save or stunned until end of Worm’s next turn.

creatures.name: Naga
creatures.appearance: Serpents often with human heads or upper bodies, wise and magical.

attacks.name: Spit Venom
attacks.effect: 30-foot line. DC 14 Con save or poisoned for 1 minute. Poisoned creatures have disadvantage on saving throws.

attacks.name: Serpent Spell
attacks.effect: Naga can cast one spell (GM’s choice) at will. Often charm person or suggestion. DC based on Naga’s CR (e.g. DC 15).

creatures.name: Níðhöggr
creatures.appearance: A colossal serpent or dragon gnawing at the roots of the world tree Yggdrasil, associated with decay and darkness.

attacks.name: Root Gnaw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make a DC 16 Constitution save or have disadvantage on saving throws for 1 minute due to soul-gnawing despair.

attacks.name: Dark Maw
attacks.effect: Níðhöggr exhales a cloud of decay in a 30-foot cone. Targets must make DC 16 Wis save or be frightened for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Orm
creatures.appearance: A generic term for a serpentine dragon or worm, large and poisonous.

attacks.name: Poison Fang
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Con save or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned, target takes 1d4 poison damage each turn.

attacks.name: Burrow Ambush
attacks.effect: Orm can burrow underground and surprise attack. On the first attack after emerging, it has advantage.

creatures.name: Ouroboros
creatures.appearance: A serpent eating its own tail, symbolizing infinity. Might manifest as a cyclical dragon/serpent.

attacks.name: Eternal Coil
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 15 Wisdom save or become confused (as Confusion spell) for 1 minute, as they glimpse eternity.

attacks.name: Time Loop
attacks.effect: Once per short rest, Ouroboros can force a target within 30 feet to repeat its last action on its next turn, as if stuck in a loop (DC 15 Charisma save negates).

creatures.name: Python
creatures.appearance: A serpent slain by Apollo, large and earthbound, associated with oracles and rot.

attacks.name: Swampy Breath
attacks.effect: A 20-foot cone of miasma. DC 14 Con save or be poisoned and blinded for 1 round.

attacks.name: Constriction
attacks.effect: On a hit, target is grappled (DC 15 Str save). While grappled, target takes 1d8 bludgeoning each turn.

creatures.name: Rainbow serpent
creatures.appearance: A great serpent associated with creation, water, and the rainbow, often benevolent but can punish transgressors.

attacks.name: Prismatic Spray
attacks.effect: A 30-foot cone of rainbow light. Targets roll 1d8 for color (GM chooses effect akin to prismatic spray spell). DC 15 save of appropriate type.

attacks.name: Waters of Life
attacks.effect: Heals all allies within 20 feet for 2d8 HP, or if used offensively, creates difficult terrain (muddy water) for enemies.

creatures.name: Sea serpent
creatures.appearance: A giant serpent dwelling in oceans, long and undulating.

attacks.name: Tidal Coil
attacks.effect: On a hit, target in water must make DC 14 Str save or be pulled underwater and start drowning.

attacks.name: Brine Spit
attacks.effect: A 20-foot line of salty water. DC 13 Dex save or be blinded by salt and take full damage.

creatures.name: Tarasque
creatures.appearance: A legendary dragon-like creature with a turtle shell, lion’s head, and scaly tail, huge and formidable.

attacks.name: Massive Chomp
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 16 Strength save or knocked prone. If prone, Tarasque’s next attack against that target deals +1d8 damage.

attacks.name: Shell Bash
attacks.effect: A 10-foot radius stomp. Targets DC 15 Dex save or be knocked prone and take full damage.

creatures.name: Tsuchinoko
creatures.appearance: A small, stout snake said to have a mischievous nature and the ability to jump high.

attacks.name: Trickster Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 12 Int save or target believes Tsuchinoko has vanished, giving Tsuchinoko advantage on its next attack.

attacks.name: High Jump
attacks.effect: Tsuchinoko can leap over creatures. Next melee attack gains +2 to hit from surprise angle.

creatures.name: Typhon
creatures.appearance: A monstrous serpentine giant, father of monsters, with a hundred snake heads and terrible power.

attacks.name: Hundred Serpent Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must make DC 18 Con save or be stunned 1 round, overwhelmed by chaotic energies.

attacks.name: Storm Roar
attacks.effect: A 60-foot cone of stormy wind. Targets DC 17 Str save or be pushed 20 feet and knocked prone.

creatures.name: Ur
creatures.appearance: A primitive serpent said to dwell in remote areas, possibly huge and slow.

attacks.name: Crushing Coil
attacks.effect: On a hit, target grappled (DC 14 escape). Grappled targets take 1d6 bludgeoning each turn.

attacks.name: Hissing Lull
attacks.effect: Targets within 20 feet DC 13 Wis save or fall asleep for 1 minute, lulled by rhythmic hissing.

creatures.name: Yamata no Orochi
creatures.appearance: An eight-headed and eight-tailed giant serpent, massive and fearsome.

attacks.name: Eightfold Bite
attacks.effect: Roll to hit once; on success, deal 8d6. DC 16 Con save or paralyzed 1 round. If a head is cut off, two may grow back after a rest.

attacks.name: River Flood
attacks.effect: A surge of water in a 30-foot radius. DC 15 Str save or be swept 20 feet away and knocked prone.

creatures.name: Zilant
creatures.appearance: A winged snake or dragon, sometimes benevolent, perched over cities in legends.

attacks.name: Winged Lash
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Dex save or target is knocked prone by the gust of wings.

attacks.name: Protective Aura
attacks.effect: Allies within 20 feet gain resistance to poison and fire for 1 minute, as Zilant’s presence wards them.

creatures.name: Afanc
creatures.appearance: A lake-dwelling beaver-like monster, sometimes described with crocodilian features and great strength.

attacks.name: Crushing Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Strength save or be grappled. Grappled targets take 1d6 bludgeoning each turn as Afanc crushes them.

attacks.name: Whirlpool Tail
attacks.effect: If in water, Afanc swirls its tail. Creatures in a 15-foot radius DC 14 Strength save or be pulled 10 feet closer and knocked prone.

creatures.name: Ratatoskr
creatures.appearance: A giant squirrel that runs along Yggdrasil, messenger between eagle and serpent, clever and sly.

attacks.name: Acorn Toss
attacks.effect: Ranged 30/60 ft. On a hit, target must DC 12 Dex save or be distracted, granting Ratatoskr advantage on its next attack.

attacks.name: Chittering Insult
attacks.effect: Forces DC 13 Wisdom save. On fail, target is enraged and must spend its next action attacking Ratatoskr if possible.

creatures.name: Rat king
creatures.appearance: Several rats with tails knotted together, moving as one swarm-like entity.

attacks.name: Swarm Bite
attacks.effect: Targets attacked by the Rat King swarm must make DC 13 Con save or be diseased, suffering disadvantage on Strength checks for 1 hour.

attacks.name: Tangled Tail Trip
attacks.effect: Targets in a 10-foot radius must DC 12 Dex save or be knocked prone by the writhing mass of tails.

creatures.name: Wolpertinger
creatures.note: Already described under Rabbits and hares.

creatures.name: Actaeon
creatures.appearance: A hunter turned into a stag. A regal deer-man hybrid or simply a stag with a human’s sorrowful eyes.

attacks.name: Antler Gore
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Strength save or be pushed 10 feet. If Actaeon was once human, may hesitate (50% chance to do half damage).

attacks.name: Cursed Braying
attacks.effect: All creatures within 30 feet DC 14 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 round as they recall the tragic fate of Actaeon.

creatures.name: Ceryneian Hind
creatures.appearance: A large, golden-horned hind sacred to Artemis. Swift, graceful, and magical.

attacks.name: Golden Antlers
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must DC 14 Wisdom save or be charmed for 1 round, awed by the hind’s divine beauty.

attacks.name: Swift Hooves
attacks.effect: Ceryneian Hind can take the Dash action as a bonus action, and opportunity attacks against it have disadvantage.

creatures.name: Deer Woman
creatures.appearance: A spirit with a human female upper body and deer legs, known for luring humans away.

attacks.name: Enthralling Gaze
attacks.effect: One humanoid within 30 ft DC 14 Charisma save or be charmed, following Deer Woman away into the wilderness.

attacks.name: Hoof Stomp
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Dex save or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: Eikþyrnir
creatures.appearance: A stag standing atop Valhalla, antlers dripping dew that forms all rivers.

attacks.name: Dew Drop
attacks.effect: Heals allies in a 30-foot radius for 2d8 HP. Offensively, can blind foes with sparkling droplets (DC 14 Con save or blinded 1 round).

attacks.name: Antler Bash
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must DC 14 Strength save or be pushed 10 feet and knocked prone.

creatures.name: Goldhorn (Zlatorog)
creatures.appearance: A white chamois or ibex with golden horns that can create healing flowers from its blood.

attacks.name: Horn Pierce
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Con save or take extra 1d4 radiant damage as the horns glow with magic.

attacks.name: Healing Bloom
attacks.effect: If Goldhorn is wounded, it can bleed a drop of blood that instantly grows a healing flower. Allies eating it regain 2d8 HP.

creatures.name: Jackalope (repeated)
creatures.note: Already described under Rabbits and hares.

creatures.name: Keresh
creatures.appearance: A giant, elusive forest deer believed to be enormous and solitary.

attacks.name: Crushing Hoof
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Strength save or be knocked prone and stunned for 1 round, due to immense size.

attacks.name: Forest Aura
attacks.effect: All plants in a 30 ft radius become difficult terrain for enemies only. Allies move unhindered.

creatures.name: Peryton
creatures.appearance: A stag with bird’s wings, casting a human shadow. Often associated with prophecy and doom.

attacks.name: Aerial Gore
attacks.effect: If diving from above, deal extra 1d6 damage and DC 14 Dex save or target drops a held item.

attacks.name: Shadow Omen
attacks.effect: Target within 30 ft must DC 15 Wis save or become frightened for 1 minute, seeing a shadow of their own demise.

creatures.name: Qilin
creatures.appearance: A chimera of deer, dragon, and other creatures, benevolent and brings good fortune.

attacks.name: Hoof of Harmony
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Cha save or target’s next attack roll is at disadvantage, calmed by Qilin’s aura.

attacks.name: Blessed Mist
attacks.effect: Allies in 20 ft regain 2d8 HP and remove one disease or poison. Offensively, can force evil creatures in area DC 15 Wis save or lose their next bonus action.

creatures.name: Tarand (Parandrus)
creatures.appearance: A deer-like creature that can change the color of its fur to blend in, large and elusive.

attacks.name: Chameleonic Charge
attacks.effect: Attacks made from hiding or camouflaged status have advantage and deal +1d6 damage.

attacks.name: Color Shift
attacks.effect: Tarand becomes effectively invisible in natural terrain (DC 16 Perception to spot). Next attack after shifting is at advantage.

creatures.name: White stag
creatures.appearance: A white deer of mythical significance, often a symbol of purity or guiding omen.

attacks.name: Purifying Horn
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Wis save or be charmed for 1 minute, unable to harm the stag.

attacks.name: Guiding Light
attacks.effect: A soft glow surrounds allies, granting +1 to attack rolls and saving throws for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Xeglun
creatures.appearance: A celestial elk or deer associated with the heavens, possibly guiding shamans.

attacks.name: Starry Antlers
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Con save or target’s darkvision is negated for 1 minute as starlight blinds their supernatural sight.

attacks.name: Celestial Leap
attacks.effect: Xeglun can teleport up to 30 ft in starlight. Next attack after teleportation deals +1d6 radiant damage.

creatures.name: Auðumbla
creatures.appearance: A primeval cow who licked the ice of Ginnungagap, uncovering the first gods.

attacks.name: Icy Lick
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Con save or target’s speed halved due to freezing saliva.

attacks.name: Primordial Nourish
attacks.effect: Auðumbla can heal allies for 3d8 HP with her milk. Offensively, can force enemies to DC 15 Wis save or be calmed, unable to attack for 1 round.

creatures.name: Bai Ze
creatures.appearance: A white chimera-like bovine creature with multiple eyes and horns, wise and knowledgeable of all creatures.

attacks.name: Multi-Eye Glare
attacks.effect: A 20-ft cone. DC 14 Int save or be stunned 1 round by the overwhelming knowledge.

attacks.name: Horn Bash
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Str save or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: Kujata
creatures.appearance: A cosmic bull supporting the earth, with 40,000 eyes, horns, and limbs, immense and celestial.

attacks.name: Cosmic Stomp
attacks.effect: A 30-ft radius quake. DC 17 Str save or be knocked prone and deafened 1 round.

attacks.name: All-Seeing Gaze
attacks.effect: Forces DC 16 Wis save. On fail, target is overwhelmed by cosmic truths, taking 3d6 psychic damage and disadvantage on next attack.

creatures.name: Bicorn and Chichevache
creatures.appearance: Bicorn (feeds on kind husbands) is plump and well-fed, Chichevache (feeds on faithful wives) is gaunt and skeletal bovine.

attacks.name: Moral Judgement
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Charisma save or target confesses a moral failing, frightened for 1 round.

attacks.name: Gnawing Maw
attacks.effect: On a hit, target must DC 13 Dex save or drop one held item.

creatures.name: Bonnacon
creatures.appearance: A bull-like creature with inward-curving horns, that expels flaming dung as a weapon.

attacks.name: Flaming Dung Spray
attacks.effect: 30-ft cone. DC 15 Dex save or catch fire (1d6 fire damage per turn until extinguished).

attacks.name: Hornless Charge
attacks.effect: On a hit after a 20-ft run, DC 14 Str save or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: Hodag
creatures.appearance: A bull-like creature combined with reptilian features, horned and mean-looking.

attacks.name: Horn Gore
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Con save or be stunned 1 round, shocked by the ferocity.

attacks.name: Smoke Snort
attacks.effect: A 15-ft cone of foul breath. DC 13 Con save or poisoned until end of next turn.

creatures.name: Allocamelus
creatures.appearance: A legendary creature with the body of a camel and the head of a donkey.

attacks.name: Baffling Bray
attacks.effect: All creatures within 20 feet must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom save or become distracted, granting the Allocamelus advantage on its next attack.

attacks.name: Hump Charge
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Strength save or the target is knocked prone by the surprising force of the camelid hybrid.

creatures.name: Heavenly Llama
creatures.appearance: A mystical llama often associated with the heavens, its wool shimmering with starlight.

attacks.name: Star Flare Spit
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Constitution save or be blinded for 1 round by the brilliant flash.

attacks.name: Celestial Wool
attacks.effect: Heavenly Llama can provide a calming aura; allies within 20 feet gain advantage on Wisdom saves for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Amalthea
creatures.appearance: The goat that nurtured Zeus, often depicted as a gentle, divine goat with abundant milk.

attacks.name: Nurturing Milk
attacks.effect: Allies within 10 feet regain 2d6 HP. Offensively can dazzle a foe (DC 13 Wis save) causing them to lose their next reaction.

attacks.name: Horn Jab
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 12 Strength save or be pushed 5 feet away.

creatures.name: Aries
creatures.appearance: A celestial ram, often golden-fleeced, representing the zodiac sign.

attacks.name: Zodiac Charge
attacks.effect: On a hit, if Aries moved 20 ft beforehand, target must DC 14 Dex save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Starry Fleece
attacks.effect: Allies within 20 feet gain +1 to AC for 1 minute as constellations shimmer in its wool.

creatures.name: Barometz (Vegetable Lamb)
creatures.appearance: A plant that resembles a lamb, rooted to the earth but able to move slightly.

attacks.name: Spore Puff
attacks.effect: A 15-foot radius cloud. DC 13 Con save or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned, target sneezes uncontrollably (no reactions).

attacks.name: Root Whip
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 12 Strength save or the target is restrained by roots until they spend an action to break free.

creatures.name: Capricornus
creatures.appearance: A mythical sea-goat, half goat and half fish, associated with the zodiac.

attacks.name: Marine Horn
attacks.effect: On a hit, if in water, DC 14 Strength save or target is dragged underwater, starting to suffocate if it cannot breathe water.

attacks.name: Tidal Blessing
attacks.effect: Allies within 20 feet gain advantage on Dexterity saves for 1 minute, moving gracefully like fish.

creatures.name: Dahu
creatures.appearance: A goat-like animal with legs shorter on one side, adapted to mountain slopes.

attacks.name: Sideways Charge
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 12 Dex save or the target is knocked off balance (disadvantage on next attack roll).

attacks.name: Mountain Shuffle
attacks.effect: Dahu can move along sheer cliffs without checks. If it attacks after climbing, deal +1d6 damage on that attack.

creatures.name: Faun
creatures.appearance: A human with goat legs, akin to satyrs, playful, music-loving woodland spirits.

attacks.name: Panpipe Melody
attacks.effect: All enemies in 30 ft DC 14 Wis save or be charmed, swaying and losing their next reaction.

attacks.name: Hoof Kick
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 12 Strength save or fall prone.

creatures.name: Heiðrún
creatures.appearance: A goat in Valhalla whose udders produce mead for the Einherjar.

attacks.name: Mead Spray
attacks.effect: Allies within 15 ft regain 1d8 HP and gain advantage on their next attack roll. Enemies caught in it must DC 13 Wis save or be drowsy (disadvantage on next attack).

attacks.name: Divine Horn
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Con save or blinded by divine light for 1 round.

creatures.name: Khnum
creatures.appearance: A ram-headed god who fashions humans from clay on a potter’s wheel.

attacks.name: Clay Shaping
attacks.effect: Khnum can mold earth within 10 ft. Offensively, can encase a target’s feet in clay (DC 15 Str save or speed halved).

attacks.name: Ram Charge
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Str save or be knocked prone and stunned 1 round due to divine force.

creatures.name: Satyr
creatures.appearance: A half-goat, half-man reveler associated with Dionysus, trickery, and merriment.

attacks.name: Revelry Pipes
attacks.effect: DC 14 Wis save or enemies become charmed, dancing uncontrollably and losing their next action.

attacks.name: Goading Horns
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Wis save or the target must attack the Satyr next turn if possible, taunted by its mockery.

creatures.name: Sidehill gouger
creatures.appearance: A goat-like creature adapted to hillsides, legs shorter on one side like the Dahu.

attacks.name: Hillside Tackle
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 12 Dex save or rolled down the hill (move 10 ft involuntarily, fall prone).

attacks.name: Gravity Shift
attacks.effect: If fighting on uneven terrain, Gouger can cause enemies to have disadvantage on Acrobatics checks.

creatures.name: Tanngrisnir and Tanngnjóstr
creatures.appearance: Thor’s magical goats that pull his chariot, resurrected each day after being eaten.

attacks.name: Thunderous Hooves
attacks.effect: A 15-ft cone shockwave. DC 14 Con save or be deafened 1 minute.

attacks.name: Rebirth Feast
attacks.effect: If slain, can be resurrected if bones are not broken. Offensively, can distract a target (DC 13 Wis save) causing it to lose next reaction.

creatures.name: Chrysomallos
creatures.appearance: A golden-fleeced ram whose wool was sought as the Golden Fleece.

attacks.name: Golden Charge
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Wis save or target is blinded by shimmering fleece 1 round.

attacks.name: Wool of Inspiration
attacks.effect: Allies within 20 ft gain +2 on saving throws for 1 minute. Enemies must DC 14 Charisma save or be intimidated, having disadvantage on Intimidation checks.

creatures.name: Anggitay
creatures.appearance: A creature with the upper body of a beautiful woman and the lower body of a horse, similar to a centaur but exclusively female.

attacks.name: Hoof Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Strength save or be knocked prone by the powerful kick.

attacks.name: Alluring Song
attacks.effect: One humanoid within 30 ft must make DC 14 Wisdom save or be charmed for 1 minute, drawn by Anggitay’s enchanting voice.

creatures.name: Arion
creatures.appearance: An immortal, swift horse capable of human speech, offspring of Poseidon.

attacks.name: Lightning Gallop
attacks.effect: If Arion moves 30 ft before attacking, target makes DC 14 Dex save or be knocked prone and stunned 1 round.

attacks.name: Divine Neigh
attacks.effect: All allies within 30 ft gain +10 ft movement and advantage on Initiative rolls for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Balius and Xanthus
creatures.appearance: Immortal horses of Achilles, offspring of harpies, swift and intelligent.

attacks.name: Twin Kick
attacks.effect: If both horses are present, they attack in tandem. On a hit, DC 14 Strength save or target is knocked back 10 ft.

attacks.name: Prophetic Whinny
attacks.effect: They can foretell danger. Allies within 20 ft gain +2 on saving throws vs traps or ambushes for 10 minutes.

creatures.name: Buraq
creatures.appearance: A celestial steed from heaven, part mule, part donkey, with wings, who carried prophets.

attacks.name: Skybound Kick
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Con save or be blinded by holy light for 1 round.

attacks.name: Celestial Flight
attacks.effect: Buraq can travel great distances instantly (misty step-like ability). Allies within 10 ft can teleport with it once per day.

creatures.name: Centaur
creatures.appearance: A creature with the upper body of a human and the lower body of a horse.

attacks.name: Hoof Stomp
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Strength save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Archery Volley
attacks.effect: Ranged attack. If at least two other centaurs are attacking the same target, deal +1d8 damage due to coordinated fire.

creatures.name: Cheval Gauvin
creatures.appearance: A horse that tries to kill its rider by galloping into dangerous areas.

attacks.name: Lethal Gallop
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Dex save or rider is thrown off, taking fall damage and becoming prone.

attacks.name: Deadly Sprint
attacks.effect: If Cheval Gauvin moves more than 40 ft straight toward a target before attacking, it deals +1d6 damage on its next attack.

creatures.name: Cheval Mallet
creatures.appearance: A cursed horse that tempts weary travelers and kidnaps them. Appears as a fine steed, but leads riders to doom.

attacks.name: Malevolent Mount
attacks.effect: If a creature mounts it, DC 15 Wis save or become charmed and compelled to ride into dangerous terrain.

attacks.name: Nightmare Charge
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Wis save or be frightened 1 minute as visions of doom fill the target’s mind.

creatures.name: Chiron
creatures.appearance: A wise and noble centaur, mentor of heroes, unlike other centaurs known for wisdom and healing arts.

attacks.name: Guiding Arrow
attacks.effect: On a hit, an ally of Chiron’s choice gains advantage on their next attack against the same target.

attacks.name: Healing Touch
attacks.effect: Chiron can heal a creature for 3d8 HP and remove one poison or disease. Offensively can choose to deal nonlethal damage at will.

creatures.name: Chollima
creatures.appearance: A winged horse too swift to be mounted by any mortal, symbolic of unattainable speed.

attacks.name: Uncatchable Dash
attacks.effect: Chollima can take the Dash action as a bonus action, and opportunity attacks against it have disadvantage.

attacks.name: Aerial Buck
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Strength save or target is knocked 10 ft away and if target is airborne, it falls.

creatures.name: Drapé
creatures.appearance: A ghostly horse monster that finds children wandering at night and spirits them away.

attacks.name: Spectral Whinny
attacks.effect: DC 14 Wis save or target is frightened for 1 minute. They hear phantom hoofbeats closing in from all sides.

attacks.name: Nightmare Grab
attacks.effect: If attacking a child or a small creature, DC 13 Str save or be grabbed and carried off. Victim is restrained until freed.

creatures.name: Gytrash
creatures.appearance: A shapeshifting spirit usually in the form of a horse, mule, or other animal that guides lost travelers home.

attacks.name: Illusory Path
attacks.effect: Enemies in 30 ft must DC 14 Int save or see misleading paths. They have disadvantage on Survival checks for 10 minutes.

attacks.name: Kind Guide
attacks.effect: If acting benevolently, allies gain advantage on next Perception or Navigation check. If acting maliciously, can lead a target into ambush (next enemy attack against that target has advantage).

creatures.name: Haizum
creatures.appearance: The horse of the archangel Gabriel, radiant and swift.

attacks.name: Radiant Hoof
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Con save or blinded by holy light for 1 round.

attacks.name: Winged Sprint
attacks.effect: Haizum can Fly at double speed for one turn, and allies who see it gain +1 to their next saving throw.

creatures.name: Hippogriff
creatures.appearance: A creature with the front body of an eagle and the hind body of a horse.

attacks.name: Beak Strike
attacks.effect: If attacking from above, target DC 13 Dex save or be knocked prone.

attacks.name: Hoof Rake
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Strength save or target’s movement is halved next turn.

creatures.name: Ipotane
creatures.appearance: A half-horse, half-human creature considered the original centaurs, often more docile.

attacks.name: Gentle Hooves
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 12 Str save or be pushed 5 ft. Less aggressive, often nonlethal.

attacks.name: Shared Wisdom
attacks.effect: Allies in 10 ft gain +1 to Int and Wis checks for 1 hour. If used offensively, can force a DC 14 Wis save to distract a foe with philosophical musings (foe loses next reaction).

creatures.name: Karkadann
creatures.appearance: A monstrous unicorn-like creature, extremely aggressive, with a horn reputed to neutralize poison.

attacks.name: Savage Horn
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Str save or be lifted and thrown 10 ft, taking 1d6 falling damage.

attacks.name: Anti-Poison Aura
attacks.effect: All creatures within 10 ft are immune to poison. If used offensively, can instead force a poison-afflicted enemy to DC 14 Con save or take an extra 2d6 radiant as toxins are violently purged.

creatures.name: Kotobuki
creatures.appearance: A yokai made up of all the Chinese zodiac animals combined, often symbolizing longevity.

attacks.name: Zodiac Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, roll 1d12 to determine extra effect (GM’s choice, e.g. poison, stun, etc.).

attacks.name: Longevity Blessing
attacks.effect: Allies in 20 ft regain 2d8 HP and gain +1 to all saves for 1 minute. Offensively, can force enemies to age 1 year (no immediate effect unless story-driven).

creatures.name: Longma
creatures.appearance: A winged horse with dragon scales, symbol of power and nobility.

attacks.name: Scaled Hoof
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Con save or target takes 1d4 bleeding damage each turn until healed.

attacks.name: Draconic Flight
attacks.effect: Longma can fly at double speed and all allies seeing its majestic form gain advantage on their next attack roll.

creatures.name: Mankayia
creatures.appearance: A tornado spirit in the form of a horse, associated with whirlwinds.

attacks.name: Whirlwind Kick
attacks.effect: A 15 ft cone gust. DC 14 Str save or be knocked prone and pushed 10 ft.

attacks.name: Storm Gallop
attacks.effect: Mankayia moves through enemies’ spaces. Those enemies must DC 14 Dex save or take 2d6 lightning damage from static discharge.

creatures.name: Onocentaur
creatures.appearance: A half-human, half-donkey creature, similar to a centaur but donkey-bodied.

attacks.name: Donkey Kick
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 12 Str save or target’s speed halved next turn.

attacks.name: Braying Taunt
attacks.effect: DC 13 Wis save or target must attack Onocentaur next turn if able, distracted by the obnoxious braying.

creatures.name: Pegasus
creatures.appearance: A winged horse, pure white and noble.

attacks.name: Wing Buffet
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Dex save or be knocked prone by a gust of wind from its wings.

attacks.name: Soaring Grace
attacks.effect: Allies within 20 ft gain advantage on saving throws against fear for 1 minute. If used offensively, can blind a foe with reflected sunlight (DC 14 Con save or blinded 1 round).

creatures.name: Pooka
creatures.appearance: A shape-shifting spirit often appearing as a dark horse with glowing eyes, sometimes beneficial, often mischievous.

attacks.name: Illusory Form
attacks.effect: DC 14 Int save or target sees Pooka as a harmless animal and will not attack it unless harmed first.

attacks.name: Nightmare Ride
attacks.effect: If a creature mounts it unwillingly, DC 14 Wis save or be frightened, seeing visions of terrible journeys.

creatures.name: Sleipnir
creatures.appearance: Odin’s eight-legged horse, fastest of all horses, can travel between worlds.

attacks.name: Eight-Legged Stomp
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Str save or be knocked prone and stunned 1 round, overwhelmed by the flurry of legs.

attacks.name: World-Strider
attacks.effect: Sleipnir can teleport up to 100 ft, passing through dimensions. Allies witnessing this gain advantage on their next Arcana check.

creatures.name: Sihuanaba
creatures.appearance: A shapeshifting spirit that often appears as a beautiful woman from behind, but with a horse’s face when seen from the front.

attacks.name: Horrific Reveal
attacks.effect: One target seeing her true face must DC 14 Wis save or be frightened for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Deceptive Allure
attacks.effect: DC 15 Cha save or target is charmed, following her into dangerous terrain. If attacked while charmed, they lose 1 turn in confusion.

creatures.name: Tikbalang
creatures.appearance: A tall, lanky humanoid with the head and limbs of a horse, known for trickery in the forests.

attacks.name: Spindly Kick
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Dex save or target’s AC is reduced by 1 next round due to disorientation.

attacks.name: Forest Illusion
attacks.effect: DC 15 Int save or target becomes lost, treating all directions as reversed for 10 minutes.

creatures.name: Uchchaihshravas
creatures.appearance: A seven-headed, all-white flying horse, considered the king of horses.

attacks.name: Seven-Voiced Neigh
attacks.effect: A 30 ft cone. DC 15 Con save or deafened 1 minute, and lose next reaction.

attacks.name: Radiant Flight
attacks.effect: Allies within 30 ft gain +2 on attack rolls for 1 minute as the aura of purity inspires them.

creatures.name: Unicorn
creatures.appearance: A horse-like creature with a single horn, often symbolizing purity and grace.

attacks.name: Horn of Purity
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Wis save or be charmed (if non-evil). Evil creatures must DC 15 Con save or take extra 2d6 radiant.

attacks.name: Healing Touch
attacks.effect: Unicorn can heal a creature for 4d8 HP and remove one curse. Offensively, can choose to blind a foe with a flash of hornlight (DC 14 Con save).

creatures.name: Winged unicorn
creatures.appearance: A unicorn with wings, combining the virtues of Pegasus and Unicorn.

attacks.name: Celestial Horn
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Cha save or target is stunned by overwhelming grace for 1 round.

attacks.name: Wings of Mercy
attacks.effect: All allies within 30 ft regain 2d8 HP and remove one level of exhaustion. Enemies must DC 15 Wis save or be unwilling to attack for 1 round.

creatures.name: Abath
creatures.appearance: A mythical elephant-like creature, often large with rough dark skin and oversized tusks, possibly a local legend.

attacks.name: Tusk Gore
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Strength save or be knocked prone. If prone, Abath deals +1d6 damage on its next attack against that target.

attacks.name: Trampling Charge
attacks.effect: If Abath moves at least 20 ft straight toward a target before attacking, that target DC 15 Dex save or be knocked prone and stunned 1 round due to the force of impact.

creatures.name: Baku
creatures.appearance: A tapir-like dream-eating spirit with an elephant’s trunk, often depicted with a chimera of animal parts.

attacks.name: Dream Consumption
attacks.effect: On a hit (melee spell attack), DC 14 Wis save or target falls asleep (as the Sleep spell) for 1 minute. If asleep, Baku can choose to restore 2d8 HP by devouring their nightmares.

attacks.name: Trunk Bash
