attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Strength save or be knocked back 5 ft. If used on a sleeping target, deals max damage automatically.

creatures.name: Behemoth
creatures.appearance: A colossal land beast, often compared to a massive hippopotamus or elephant, unmovable and strong.

attacks.name: Titanic Stomp
attacks.effect: 30 ft radius quake. DC 17 Strength save or all creatures fall prone. Structures take double damage.

attacks.name: Mighty Bellow
attacks.effect: A 60 ft cone roar. DC 16 Con save or be deafened 1 minute and pushed 10 ft back.

creatures.name: Quugaarpak
creatures.appearance: A mythical underworld creature believed to be the explanation for mammoth remains. A massive tusked beast that tunnels upward but dies upon breathing surface air.

attacks.name: Burrow Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Dex save or target is partially buried in earth, restraining them (escape DC 14).

attacks.name: Underworld Tusk
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Con save or target’s max HP is reduced by amount equal to half the damage dealt until a long rest.

creatures.name: Taweret
creatures.note: Already described under Lion category (as a hippo-lion-croc mix).

creatures.name: Calydonian Boar
creatures.appearance: A gigantic, savage boar sent by Artemis, with razor-sharp tusks and bristly hide.

attacks.name: Tusk Gore
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Str save or target is knocked prone. Bleeding wound: target takes 1d4 damage at start of each turn until healed.

attacks.name: Furious Charge
attacks.effect: If moves 20 ft straight before attack, target DC 14 Dex save or be pushed 10 ft and stunned 1 round.

creatures.name: Erymanthian Boar
creatures.appearance: Another colossal boar hunted by Heracles, infamous for its ferocity and strength.

attacks.name: Thunderous Snort
attacks.effect: A 15 ft cone. DC 14 Con save or be deafened for 1 minute. Creatures deafened this way have disadvantage on Perception checks.

attacks.name: Trample
attacks.effect: On a hit against a prone target, deals double damage. DC 15 Strength save or also grappled under its hooves.

creatures.name: Zhu Bajie
creatures.appearance: A half-man, half-pig character, wielding a nine-toothed rake, lazy but strong.

attacks.name: Rake Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Dex save or target’s AC is reduced by 1 for 1 round as their armor is dented.

attacks.name: Gluttonous Charge
attacks.effect: If Zhu Bajie moved 20 ft before hitting, target DC 13 Wis save or be distracted by his crude taunts, granting Zhu Bajie advantage on next attack.

creatures.name: Mapinguari
creatures.appearance: A giant sloth-like creature with tough skin, a giant mouth on its belly, and foul odor.

attacks.name: Belly Maw Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 15 Str save or be grappled. Grappled targets take 1d6 acid damage each turn inside the maw.

attacks.name: Horrid Stench
attacks.effect: 20 ft radius. DC 14 Con save or be poisoned 1 minute and unable to concentrate on spells due to retching.

creatures.name: Quugaarpak
creatures.note: Already described under Pachyderms as the explanation for mammoth remains.

creatures.name: General Giants
creatures.note: A full list of giants was mentioned but not specifically enumerated in the original text. Giants are humanoids of enormous size from various mythologies. They often have attacks like 'Rock Throw' (2d10 bludgeoning, DC varies) and 'Ground Pound' (3d8 bludgeoning in a radius). Without specific named giants given in the original list, we leave this note.

creatures.name: Automaton
creatures.appearance: A self-operating machine, often humanoid, made of metal or wood.

attacks.name: Clockwork Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Con save or be stunned 1 round as gears jam the target’s senses.

attacks.name: Gearspark Discharge
attacks.effect: Ranged 30 ft. On a hit, DC 12 Dex save or target’s next attack is made at disadvantage due to static shock.

creatures.name: Blodeuwedd
creatures.appearance: A woman formed from flowers. Though artificial in origin, considered fey or magical construct.

attacks.name: Floral Embrace
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Con save or target is ensnared in vines, restrained until they break free (DC 14 Str).

attacks.name: Pollen Charm
attacks.effect: DC 15 Wis save or target is charmed for 1 minute, seeing Blodeuwedd as a trusted ally.

creatures.name: Brazen head
creatures.appearance: A talking head of brass said to answer any question.

attacks.name: Omniscient Utterance
attacks.effect: DC 15 Int save or target is stunned 1 round, overwhelmed by impossible knowledge.

attacks.name: Confounding Question
attacks.effect: Target must DC 14 Wis save or be confused (as Confusion spell) for 1d4 rounds.

creatures.name: Doll Woman (Lenape)
creatures.appearance: A lifelike doll spirit, created by magic, can cause mischief if not appeased.

attacks.name: Needle Stab
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 12 Con save or target takes an extra 1d4 necrotic as the doll drains vitality.

attacks.name: Spirit Puppetry
attacks.effect: DC 14 Cha save or target is controlled for 1 round, making them use their action as Doll Woman desires.

creatures.name: Frankenstein's monster
creatures.appearance: A stitched-together humanoid made of corpses, strong and misunderstood.

attacks.name: Brutal Slam
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Str save or be knocked prone. If prone, Monster deals +1d6 damage on next attack.

attacks.name: Grief-Fueled Rage
attacks.effect: If reduced below half HP, Monster gains advantage on attacks and +2 damage for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Galatea
creatures.appearance: An ivory statue carved by Pygmalion, brought to life by Aphrodite.

attacks.name: Ivory Strike
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Dex save or target drops one held item, slipping from their grasp.

attacks.name: Loving Gaze
attacks.effect: DC 14 Wis save or be charmed, unable to attack Galatea for 1 minute.

creatures.name: Gingerbread man
creatures.appearance: A small, animated cookie in human form, mischievously fast.

attacks.name: Crumb Toss
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 12 Dex save or target is distracted, granting Gingerbread man advantage on next attack.

attacks.name: Run, Run!
attacks.effect: Gingerbread man can Disengage and Dash as a bonus action. Enemies must DC 13 Wis save or be too amused to attack it for 1 round.

creatures.name: Golem
creatures.appearance: A humanoid construct of clay or mud animated by holy words.

attacks.name: Clay Fist
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Str save or be grappled and restrained as clay hardens around the target.

attacks.name: Earthen Shield
attacks.effect: As a reaction, Golem hardens its body, gaining +2 AC until start of its next turn.

creatures.name: Homunculus
creatures.appearance: A small humanoid created through alchemical means, diminutive but intelligent.

attacks.name: Alchemical Bite
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 12 Con save or target’s armor/weapon takes a -1 penalty as acid corrodes it.

attacks.name: Toxic Spit
attacks.effect: Ranged 20 ft. DC 13 Con save or poisoned for 1 minute, disadvantage on attack rolls.

creatures.name: Nephele
creatures.appearance: A nymph formed from a cloud by Zeus, resembling a goddess but made of mist.

attacks.name: Cloud Embrace
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Wis save or target’s vision is obscured, granting disadvantage on Perception checks for 1 minute.

attacks.name: Vapor Shift
attacks.effect: Nephele can move through enemies’ spaces, forcing DC 13 Dex save or they lose their reaction as they cough on mist.

creatures.name: Shabti/Ushabti
creatures.appearance: Clay or wooden figurines placed in tombs, servants in the afterlife brought to life by magic.

attacks.name: Clay Blade
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 12 Strength save or be slowed (speed halved) as clay residue clings to limbs.

attacks.name: Servant’s Duty
attacks.effect: Shabti can take damage meant for its master if within 5 ft, reducing that damage by half.

creatures.name: Tokeloshe (Tikoloshe)
creatures.appearance: A small hairy humanoid created by witches, with various magical powers, often mischievous or malevolent.

attacks.name: Witch’s Claw
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Con save or target takes 1d4 necrotic damage each turn for 3 turns.

attacks.name: Nightmare Whisper
attacks.effect: DC 14 Wis save or target is frightened and cannot benefit from long rests that night.

creatures.name: Tilberi
creatures.appearance: A creation of a witch from a rib and wool, used to steal milk. Small, worm-like or humanoid.

attacks.name: Milk Drain
attacks.effect: Target’s rations and stored food spoil instantly. If used on livestock, they produce no milk for a day.

attacks.name: Woolen Strangle
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 12 Str save or be grappled by fibrous strands. Grappled target takes 1d4 bludgeoning each turn.

creatures.name: Tsukumogami
creatures.appearance: Household objects that come to life after 100 years, such as umbrellas, sandals, teapots.

attacks.name: Animate Strike
attacks.damage: Varies (2d6 bludgeoning or slashing depending on object)
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 13 Int save or be surprised as the familiar object attacks, granting Tsukumogami advantage on next attack.

attacks.name: Mischief Scatter
attacks.effect: Forces DC 14 Wis save or target drops a held object as the Tsukumogami’s sudden movement startles them.

creatures.name: Tulpa
creatures.appearance: A creature brought to life by meditation and thought-form, can vary widely in form.

attacks.name: Mind Echo
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Wis save or target is stunned 1 round by mental feedback.

attacks.name: Thought-Form Shift
attacks.effect: Tulpa changes shape, imposing disadvantage on next attack roll against it as foes misjudge its form.

creatures.name: Tupilaq
creatures.appearance: A small, carved figure brought to life by shamans, often to harm enemies. Bone, wood, sinew.

attacks.name: Bone Scrape
attacks.effect: On a hit, DC 14 Con save or contract a curse dealing 1d4 necrotic damage per turn for 3 turns.

attacks.name: Dark Fetish
attacks.effect: DC 15 Cha save or target is cursed: disadvantage on saves vs fear and charm for 1 hour.
